BioImager  3.6.0
A .NET microscopy imaging library. Supports various microscopes by using imported libraries & GUI automation. Supported libraries include Prior® & Zeiss® & all devices supported by Micromanager 2.0 and python-microscope.

34namespace BioImager
35{
36 /* A class declaration. */
37 public static class Images
38 {
39 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
42 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
43 {
44 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
45 {
46 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids)
47 return images[i];
48 }
49 return null;
50 }
54 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
55 {
56 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
57 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
58 im.ID = im.Filename;
59 images.Add(im);
60 App.nodeView.UpdateNodes();
61 if (newtab)
62 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
63 else
64 {
65 if (!App.viewer.Images.Contains(im))
66 {
67 App.viewer.AddImage(im);
68 App.viewer.Update();
69 }
70 }
71 }
78 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
79 {
80 int i = 0;
81 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
82 {
83 string name = images[im].ID;
84 int sti = name.LastIndexOf("-");
85 string st = name;
86 if(sti != -1)
87 st = name.Remove(sti);
88 if (images[im].ID == st)
89 i++;
90 }
91 return i;
92 }
98 public static string GetImageName(string s)
99 {
100 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
101 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
102 if (i == 0)
103 return Path.GetFileName(s);
104 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
105 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
106 int sti = name.LastIndexOf("-");
107 if (sti == -1)
108 {
109 return name + "-" + (i) + ext;
110 }
111 else
112 {
113 string stb = name.Substring(0, sti);
114 string sta = name.Substring(sti + 1, name.Length - sti - 1);
115 int ind;
116 if (int.TryParse(sta, out ind))
117 {
118 return stb + "-" + (i + 1).ToString() + ext;
119 }
120 else
121 return name + "-" + (i + 1) + ext;
122 }
123 //
124 }
128 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
129 {
130 RemoveImage(im.ID);
131 }
137 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
138 {
139 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
140 if (im == null)
141 return;
142 images.Remove(im);
143 //im.Dispose();
144 im = null;
145 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.RemoveImage(" + '"' + id + '"' + ");");
146 }
147
153 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
154 {
155 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
156 {
157 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
158 {
159 images[i] = im;
160 return;
161 }
162 }
163 }
164 }
165 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
166 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
167 public struct Resolution
168 {
169 int x;
170 int y;
171 PixelFormat format;
172 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
173 public int SizeX
174 {
175 get { return x; }
176 set { x = value; }
177 }
178 public int SizeY
179 {
180 get { return y; }
181 set { y = value; }
182 }
183 public double PhysicalSizeX
184 {
185 get { return px; }
186 set { px = value; }
187 }
188 public double PhysicalSizeY
189 {
190 get { return py; }
191 set { py = value; }
192 }
193 public double PhysicalSizeZ
194 {
195 get { return pz; }
196 set { pz = value; }
197 }
198 public double StageSizeX
199 {
200 get { return sx; }
201 set { sx = value; }
202 }
203 public double StageSizeY
204 {
205 get { return sy; }
206 set { sy = value; }
207 }
208 public double StageSizeZ
209 {
210 get { return sz; }
211 set { sz = value; }
212 }
213 public double VolumeWidth
214 {
215 get
216 {
217 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
218 }
219 }
220 public double VolumeHeight
221 {
222 get
223 {
224 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
225 }
226 }
227 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
228 {
229 get { return format; }
230 set { format = value; }
231 }
232 public int RGBChannelsCount
233 {
234 get
235 {
236 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
237 return 1;
238 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
239 return 3;
240 else
241 return 4;
242 }
243 }
244 public long SizeInBytes
245 {
246 get
247 {
248 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
249 return (long)y * (long)x;
250 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
251 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
252 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
253 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
254 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
255 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
256 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
257 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
258 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
259 }
260 }
261 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
262 {
263 x = w;
264 y = h;
265 sx = stageX;
266 sy = stageY;
267 sz = stageZ;
268 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
269 px = physX;
270 py = physY;
271 pz = physZ;
272 }
273 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
274 {
275 x = w;
276 y = h;
277 format = f;
278 sx = stageX;
279 sy = stageY;
280 sz = stageZ;
281 px = physX;
282 py = physY;
283 pz = physZ;
284 }
285 public Resolution Copy()
286 {
287 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
288 }
289 public override string ToString()
290 {
291 return "(" + x + ", " + y + ") " + format.ToString() + " " + (SizeInBytes / 1000) + " KB";
292 }
293 }
294 /* The ROI class is a class that contains a list of points, a bounding box, and a type */
295 public class ROI
296 {
297 /* Defining an enum. */
298 public enum Type
299 {
300 Rectangle,
301 Point,
302 Line,
303 Polygon,
304 Polyline,
305 Freeform,
306 Ellipse,
307 Label,
308 Mask
309 }
310 /* A property of a class. */
311 public PointD Point
312 {
313 get
314 {
315 if (Points.Count == 0)
316 return new PointD(0, 0);
317 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Ellipse || type == Type.Label || type == Type.Freeform)
318 return new PointD(BoundingBox.X, BoundingBox.Y);
319 return Points[0];
320 }
321 set
322 {
323 if (Points.Count == 0)
324 {
325 AddPoint(value);
326 }
327 else
328 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
329 UpdateBoundingBox();
330 }
331 }
332 public RectangleD Rect
333 {
334 get
335 {
336 if (Points.Count == 0)
337 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
338 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
339 return BoundingBox;
340 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
341 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
342 else
343 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
344 }
345 set
346 {
347 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
348 {
349 BoundingBox = value;
350 }
351 else
352 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
353 {
354 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
355 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
356 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
357 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
358 }
359 else
360 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
361 {
362 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
363 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
364 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
365 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
366 }
367 UpdateBoundingBox();
368 }
369 }
370 public double X
371 {
372 get
373 {
374 return Point.X;
375 }
376 set
377 {
378 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
379 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
380 }
381 }
382 public double Y
383 {
384 get
385 {
386 return Point.Y;
387 }
388 set
389 {
390 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
391 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
392 }
393 }
394 public double W
395 {
396 get
397 {
398 if (type == Type.Point)
399 return strokeWidth;
400 else
401 return BoundingBox.W;
402 }
403 set
404 {
405 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
406 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
407 }
408 }
409 public double H
410 {
411 get
412 {
413 if (type == Type.Point)
414 return strokeWidth;
415 else
416 return BoundingBox.H;
417 }
418 set
419 {
420 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
421 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
422 }
423 }
424 public int Resolution
425 {
426 get { return resolution; }
427 set { resolution = value; }
428 }
429 public enum CoordinateSystem
430 {
431 pixel,
432 micron
433 }
434 public Type type;
435 public Gdk.Pixbuf mask;
436 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
437 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
438 public List<PointD> PointsD
439 {
440 get
441 {
442 return Points;
443 }
444 }
445 public PointD[] PointsImage
446 {
447 get
448 {
449 return ImageView.SelectedImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD);
450 }
451 }
452 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
453 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
454 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
455 public float fontSize = 12;
456 public Cairo.FontSlant slant;
457 public Cairo.FontWeight weight;
458 public string family = "Times New Roman";
459 public ZCT coord;
460 public Color strokeColor;
461 public Color fillColor;
462 public bool isFilled = false;
463 public string id = "";
464 public string roiID = "";
465 public string roiName = "";
466 public string properties = "";
467 public int serie = 0;
468 private string text = "";
469 private int resolution = 0;
470 public double strokeWidth = 1;
471 public int shapeIndex = 0;
472 public bool closed = false;
473 public bool selected = false;
474 public bool subPixel = false;
475
476 /*
477 public Size TextSize
478 {
479 get
480 {
481 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
482 }
483 }
484 */
485 public ROI Copy()
486 {
487 ROI copy = new ROI();
488 copy.id = id;
489 copy.roiID = roiID;
490 copy.roiName = roiName;
491 copy.text = text;
492 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
493 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
494 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
495 copy.Points = Points;
496 copy.selected = selected;
497 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
498 copy.closed = closed;
499 copy.family = family;
500 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
501 copy.slant = slant;
502 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
503 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
504 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
505 copy.coord = coord;
506 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
507
508 return copy;
509 }
510 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
511 {
512 ROI copy = new ROI();
513 copy.type = type;
514 copy.id = id;
515 copy.roiID = roiID;
516 copy.roiName = roiName;
517 copy.text = text;
518 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
519 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
520 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
521 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
522 copy.selected = selected;
523 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
524 copy.closed = closed;
525 copy.family = family;
526 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
527 copy.slant = slant;
528 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
529 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
530 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
531 copy.coord = cord;
532 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
533 return copy;
534 }
535 public string Text
536 {
537 get
538 {
539 return text;
540 }
541 set
542 {
543 text = value;
544 if (type == Type.Label)
545 {
546 UpdateBoundingBox();
547 }
548 }
549 }
556 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scaleX, double scaleY)
557 {
558 double fx = scaleX / 2;
559 double fy = scaleY / 2;
560 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - fx, BoundingBox.Y - fy, BoundingBox.W + scaleX, BoundingBox.H + scaleY);
561 }
562 /* Creating a new ROI object. */
563 public ROI()
564 {
565 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
566 strokeColor = Color.Yellow;
567 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
568 }
569
576 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
577 {
578 double f = s / 2;
579 selectBoxs.Clear();
580 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
581 {
582 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
583 }
584 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
585 }
593 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
594 {
595 ROI an = new ROI();
596 an.coord = coord;
597 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
598 an.type = Type.Point;
599 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreatePoint(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), " + x + "," + y + ");");
600 return an;
601 }
609
610 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
611 {
612 ROI an = new ROI();
613 an.coord = coord;
614 an.type = Type.Line;
615 an.AddPoint(x1);
616 an.AddPoint(x2);
617 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateLine(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new PointD(" + x1.X + "," + x1.Y + "), new PointD(" + x2.X + "," + x2.Y + "));");
618 return an;
619 }
629 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
630 {
631 ROI an = new ROI();
632 an.coord = coord;
633 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
634 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
635 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateRectangle(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
636 return an;
637 }
647 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
648 {
649 ROI an = new ROI();
650 an.coord = coord;
651 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
652 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
653 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateEllipse(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
654 return an;
655 }
662 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
663 {
664 ROI an = new ROI();
665 an.coord = coord;
666 an.type = Type.Polygon;
667 an.AddPoints(pts);
668 an.closed = true;
669 return an;
670 }
677 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
678 {
679 ROI an = new ROI();
680 an.coord = coord;
681 an.type = Type.Freeform;
682 an.AddPoints(pts);
683 an.closed = true;
684 return an;
685 }
686
691 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
692 {
693 if (i < Points.Count)
694 {
695 Points[i] = p;
696 }
697 UpdateBoundingBox();
698 }
704 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
705 {
706 return Points[i];
707 }
711 public PointD[] GetPoints()
712 {
713 return Points.ToArray();
714 }
718 public PointF[] GetPointsF()
719 {
720 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
721 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
722 {
723 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
724 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
725 }
726 return pfs;
727 }
731 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
732 {
733 Points.Add(p);
734 UpdateBoundingBox();
735 }
739 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
740 {
741 Points.AddRange(p);
742 UpdateBoundingBox();
743 }
747 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
748 {
749 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
750 {
751 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
752 }
753 UpdateBoundingBox();
754 }
758 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
759 {
760 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
761 {
762 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
763 }
764 UpdateBoundingBox();
765 }
769 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
770 {
771 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
772 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
773 {
774 bool found = false;
775 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
776 {
777 if (indexs[ind] == i)
778 found = true;
779 }
780 if (!found)
781 inds.Add(Points[i]);
782 }
783 Points = inds;
784 UpdateBoundingBox();
785 }
786
790 public int GetPointCount()
791 {
792 return Points.Count;
793 }
799 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
800 {
801 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
802 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
803 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
804 {
805 string[] sints;
806 if (s.Contains("\t"))
807 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
808 else
809 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
810 double x = double.Parse(sints[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
811 double y = double.Parse(sints[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
812 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
813 }
814 return pts.ToArray();
815 }
816
822 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
823 {
824 string pts = "";
825 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
826 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
827 {
828 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
829 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
830 else
831 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
832 }
833 return pts;
834 }
837 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
838 {
839 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
840 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
841 foreach (PointD p in Points)
842 {
843 if (min.X > p.X)
844 min.X = p.X;
845 if (min.Y > p.Y)
846 min.Y = p.Y;
847
848 if (max.X < p.X)
849 max.X = p.X;
850 if (max.Y < p.Y)
851 max.Y = p.Y;
852 }
853 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
854 r.X = min.X;
855 r.Y = min.Y;
856 r.W = max.X - min.X;
857 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
858 if (r.W == 0)
859 r.W = 1;
860 if (r.H == 0)
861 r.H = 1;
862 BoundingBox = r;
863 }
864
865 public override string ToString()
866 {
867 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
868 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
869 double x = Math.Round(Point.X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
870 double y = Math.Round(Point.Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
871 return type.ToString() + ", " + Text + " (" + w + ", " + h + ") " + " (" + x + ", " + y + ") " + coord.ToString();
872 }
873 }
874 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
875 public class Filt
876 {
877 /* Defining an enum. */
878 public enum Type
879 {
880 Base = 0,
881 Base2 = 1,
882 InPlace = 2,
883 InPlace2 = 3,
884 InPlacePartial = 4,
885 Resize = 5,
886 Rotate = 6,
887 Transformation = 7,
888 Copy = 8
889 }
890 public string name;
891 public IFilter filt;
892 public Type type;
893 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
894 {
895 name = s;
896 filt = f;
897 type = t;
898 }
899 }
900 public static class Filters
901 {
902 public static int[,] indexs;
908 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
909 {
910 foreach (Filt item in filters)
911 {
912 if (item.name == name)
913 return item;
914 }
915 return null;
916 }
924 public static Filt GetFilter(int type, int index)
925 {
926 return filters[indexs[type, index]];
927 }
928 public static List<Filt> filters = new List<Filt>();
937 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
938 {
939 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
940 if (!inPlace)
941 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
942 try
943 {
944 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
945 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
946 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
947 {
948 Bitmap bm = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
949 img.Buffers[i] = bm;
950 }
951 if (!inPlace)
952 {
953 Images.AddImage(img, true);
954 }
955 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base(" + '"' + id +
956 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
957 }
958 catch (Exception e)
959 {
960 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
961 dialog.Show();
962 }
963 return img;
964 }
975 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
976 {
977 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
978 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
979 if (!inPlace)
980 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
981 try
982 {
983 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
984 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
985 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
986 {
987 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
988 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
989 }
990 if (!inPlace)
991 {
992 Images.AddImage(img, true);
993 }
994 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
995 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
996 return img;
997 }
998 catch (Exception e)
999 {
1000 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1001 dialog.Show();
1002 }
1003 return img;
1004 }
1013 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1014 {
1015 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1016 if (!inPlace)
1017 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1018 try
1019 {
1020 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1021 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
1022 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1023 {
1024 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1025 }
1026 if (!inPlace)
1027 {
1028 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1029 }
1030 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlace(" + '"' + id +
1031 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1032 return img;
1033 }
1034 catch (Exception e)
1035 {
1036 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1037 dialog.Show();
1038 }
1039 return img;
1040 }
1049 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1050 {
1051 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1052 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1053 if (!inPlace)
1054 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1055 try
1056 {
1057 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1058 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
1059 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1060 {
1061 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1062 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1063 }
1064 if (!inPlace)
1065 {
1066 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1067 }
1068 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlace2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
1069 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1070 return img;
1071 }
1072 catch (Exception e)
1073 {
1074 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1075 dialog.Show();
1076 }
1077 return img;
1078 }
1087 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1088 {
1089 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1090 if (!inPlace)
1091 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1092 try
1093 {
1094 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1095 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
1096 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1097 {
1098 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1099 }
1100 if (!inPlace)
1101 {
1102 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1103 }
1104 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlacePartial(" + '"' + id +
1105 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1106 return img;
1107 }
1108 catch (Exception e)
1109 {
1110 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1111 dialog.Show();
1112 }
1113 return img;
1114 }
1125 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
1126 {
1127 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1128 if (!inPlace)
1129 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1130 try
1131 {
1132 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1133 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
1134 fi.NewHeight = h;
1135 fi.NewWidth = w;
1136 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1137 {
1138 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1139 }
1140 if (!inPlace)
1141 {
1142 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1143 }
1144 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Resize(" + '"' + id +
1145 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1146 }
1147 catch (Exception e)
1148 {
1149 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1150 dialog.Show();
1151 }
1152 return img;
1153 }
1166 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
1167 {
1168 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1169 if (!inPlace)
1170 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
1171 try
1172 {
1173 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1174 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
1175 fi.Angle = angle;
1176 fi.FillColor = Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
1177 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1178 {
1179 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1180 }
1181 if (!inPlace)
1182 {
1183 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1184 }
1185 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Rotate(" + '"' + id +
1186 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle.ToString() + "," +
1187 a + "," + r + "," + g + "," + b + ");");
1188 }
1189 catch (Exception e)
1190 {
1191 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1192 dialog.Show();
1193 }
1194 return img;
1195
1196 }
1207 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
1208 {
1209 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1210 if (!inPlace)
1211 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1212 try
1213 {
1214 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1215 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
1216 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1217 {
1218 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1219 }
1220 if (!inPlace)
1221 {
1222 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1223 }
1224 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Transformation(" + '"' + id +
1225 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle + ");");
1226 }
1227 catch (Exception e)
1228 {
1229 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1230 dialog.Show();
1231 }
1232 return img;
1233 }
1242 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1243 {
1244 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1245 if (!inPlace)
1246 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1247 try
1248 {
1249 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1250 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
1251 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1252 {
1253 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1254 }
1255 if (!inPlace)
1256 {
1257 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1258 }
1259 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Copy(" + '"' + id +
1260 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1261 }
1262 catch (Exception e)
1263 {
1264 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1265 dialog.Show();
1266 }
1267 return img;
1268 }
1278 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1279 {
1280 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
1281 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
1282 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)Math.Abs(r.Width), (int)Math.Abs(r.Height));
1283 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
1284 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1285 {
1286 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
1287 }
1288 BioImage.AutoThreshold(img, true);
1289 if (img.bitsPerPixel > 8)
1290 img.StackThreshold(true);
1291 else
1292 img.StackThreshold(false);
1293 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Crop(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1294 //App.tabsView.AddTab(img);
1295 return img;
1296 }
1303 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
1304 {
1305 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
1306 }
1307
1309 public static void Init()
1310 {
1311 //Base Filters
1312 indexs = new int[9, 32];
1313 indexs[0, 0] = filters.Count;
1314 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
1315 filters.Add(f);
1316 indexs[0, 1] = filters.Count;
1317 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
1318 filters.Add(f);
1319 indexs[0, 2] = filters.Count;
1320 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
1321 filters.Add(f);
1322 indexs[0, 3] = filters.Count;
1323 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
1324 filters.Add(f);
1325 indexs[0, 4] = filters.Count;
1326 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
1327 filters.Add(f);
1328 indexs[0, 5] = filters.Count;
1329 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1330 filters.Add(f);
1331 indexs[0, 6] = filters.Count;
1332 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1333 filters.Add(f);
1334 indexs[0, 7] = filters.Count;
1335 f = new Filt("Grayscale", new Grayscale(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721), Filt.Type.Base);
1336 filters.Add(f);
1337 //f = new Filt("TexturedFilter", new TexturedFilter());
1338 //filters.Add(f);
1339 indexs[0, 8] = filters.Count;
1340 f = new Filt("WaterWave", new WaterWave(), Filt.Type.Base);
1341 filters.Add(f);
1342 indexs[0, 9] = filters.Count;
1343 f = new Filt("YCbCrExtractChannel", new YCbCrExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1344 filters.Add(f);
1345 indexs[0, 10] = filters.Count;
1346 //BaseFilter2
1347
1348 f = new Filt("ThresholdedDifference", new ThresholdedDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1349 filters.Add(f);
1350 indexs[1, 0] = filters.Count;
1351 f = new Filt("ThresholdedEuclideanDifference", new ThresholdedEuclideanDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1352 filters.Add(f);
1353 indexs[1, 1] = filters.Count;
1354
1355 //BaseInPlaceFilter
1356 indexs[2, 0] = filters.Count;
1357 f = new Filt("BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation", new BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1358 filters.Add(f);
1359 indexs[2, 1] = filters.Count;
1360 f = new Filt("BlobsFiltering", new BlobsFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1361 filters.Add(f);
1362 indexs[2, 2] = filters.Count;
1363 f = new Filt("BottomHat", new BottomHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1364 filters.Add(f);
1365 indexs[2, 3] = filters.Count;
1366 f = new Filt("BradleyLocalThresholding", new BradleyLocalThresholding(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1367 filters.Add(f);
1368 indexs[2, 4] = filters.Count;
1369 f = new Filt("CanvasCrop", new CanvasCrop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1370 filters.Add(f);
1371 indexs[2, 5] = filters.Count;
1372 f = new Filt("CanvasFill", new CanvasFill(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1373 filters.Add(f);
1374 indexs[2, 6] = filters.Count;
1375 f = new Filt("CanvasMove", new CanvasMove(new IntPoint()), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1376 filters.Add(f);
1377 indexs[2, 7] = filters.Count;
1378 f = new Filt("FillHoles", new FillHoles(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1379 filters.Add(f);
1380 indexs[2, 8] = filters.Count;
1381 f = new Filt("FlatFieldCorrection", new FlatFieldCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1382 filters.Add(f);
1383 indexs[2, 9] = filters.Count;
1384 f = new Filt("TopHat", new TopHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1385 filters.Add(f);
1386
1387 //BaseInPlaceFilter2
1388 indexs[3, 0] = filters.Count;
1389 f = new Filt("Add", new Add(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1390 filters.Add(f);
1391 indexs[3, 1] = filters.Count;
1392 f = new Filt("Difference", new Difference(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1393 filters.Add(f);
1394 indexs[3, 2] = filters.Count;
1395 f = new Filt("Intersect", new Intersect(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1396 filters.Add(f);
1397 indexs[3, 3] = filters.Count;
1398 f = new Filt("Merge", new Merge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1399 filters.Add(f);
1400 indexs[3, 4] = filters.Count;
1401 f = new Filt("Morph", new Morph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1402 filters.Add(f);
1403 indexs[3, 5] = filters.Count;
1404 f = new Filt("MoveTowards", new MoveTowards(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1405 filters.Add(f);
1406 indexs[3, 6] = filters.Count;
1407 f = new Filt("StereoAnaglyph", new StereoAnaglyph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1408 filters.Add(f);
1409 indexs[3, 7] = filters.Count;
1410 f = new Filt("Subtract", new Subtract(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1411 filters.Add(f);
1412 //f = new Filt("Add", new TexturedMerge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1413 //filters.Add(f);
1414
1415 //BaseInPlacePartialFilter
1416 indexs[4, 0] = filters.Count;
1417 f = new Filt("AdditiveNoise", new AdditiveNoise(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1418 filters.Add(f);
1419 //f = new Filt("ApplyMask", new ApplyMask(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial2);
1420 //filters.Add(f);
1421 indexs[4, 1] = filters.Count;
1422 f = new Filt("BrightnessCorrection", new BrightnessCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1423 filters.Add(f);
1424 indexs[4, 2] = filters.Count;
1425 f = new Filt("ChannelFiltering", new ChannelFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1426 filters.Add(f);
1427 indexs[4, 3] = filters.Count;
1428 f = new Filt("ColorFiltering", new ColorFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1429 filters.Add(f);
1430 indexs[4, 4] = filters.Count;
1431 f = new Filt("ColorRemapping", new ColorRemapping(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1432 filters.Add(f);
1433 indexs[4, 5] = filters.Count;
1434 f = new Filt("ContrastCorrection", new ContrastCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1435 filters.Add(f);
1436 indexs[4, 6] = filters.Count;
1437 f = new Filt("ContrastStretch", new ContrastStretch(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1438 filters.Add(f);
1439
1440 //f = new Filt("ErrorDiffusionDithering", new ErrorDiffusionDithering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1441 //filters.Add(f);

1444 filters.Add(f);

1447 filters.Add(f);
1448 indexs[4, 9] = filters.Count;
1449 f = new Filt("HistogramEqualization", new HistogramEqualization(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1450 filters.Add(f);
1451 indexs[4, 10] = filters.Count;
1452 f = new Filt("HorizontalRunLengthSmoothing", new HorizontalRunLengthSmoothing(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1453 filters.Add(f);
1454 indexs[4, 11] = filters.Count;
1455 f = new Filt("HSLFiltering", new HSLFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1456 filters.Add(f);
1457 indexs[4, 12] = filters.Count;
1458 f = new Filt("HueModifier", new HueModifier(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1459 filters.Add(f);
1460 indexs[4, 13] = filters.Count;
1461 f = new Filt("Invert", new Invert(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1462 filters.Add(f);
1463 indexs[4, 14] = filters.Count;
1464 f = new Filt("LevelsLinear", new LevelsLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1465 filters.Add(f);
1466 indexs[4, 15] = filters.Count;
1467 f = new Filt("LevelsLinear16bpp", new LevelsLinear16bpp(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1468 filters.Add(f);
1469 //indexs[4, 16] = 46;
1470 //f = new Filt("MaskedFilter", new MaskedFilter(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1471 //filters.Add(f);
1472 //f = new Filt("Mirror", new Mirror(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1473 //filters.Add(f);
1474 indexs[4, 16] = filters.Count;
1475 f = new Filt("OrderedDithering", new OrderedDithering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1476 filters.Add(f);
1477 indexs[4, 17] = filters.Count;
1478 f = new Filt("OtsuThreshold", new OtsuThreshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1479 filters.Add(f);
1480 indexs[4, 19] = filters.Count;
1481 f = new Filt("Pixellate", new Pixellate(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1482 filters.Add(f);
1483 indexs[4, 20] = filters.Count;
1484 f = new Filt("PointedColorFloodFill", new PointedColorFloodFill(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1485 filters.Add(f);
1486 indexs[4, 21] = filters.Count;
1487 f = new Filt("PointedMeanFloodFill", new PointedMeanFloodFill(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1488 filters.Add(f);
1489 indexs[4, 22] = filters.Count;
1490 f = new Filt("ReplaceChannel", new Invert(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1491 filters.Add(f);
1492 indexs[4, 23] = filters.Count;
1493 f = new Filt("RotateChannels", new LevelsLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1494 filters.Add(f);
1495 indexs[4, 24] = filters.Count;
1496 f = new Filt("SaltAndPepperNoise", new LevelsLinear16bpp(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1497 filters.Add(f);
1498 indexs[4, 25] = filters.Count;
1499 f = new Filt("SaturationCorrection", new SaturationCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1500 filters.Add(f);
1501 indexs[4, 26] = filters.Count;
1502 f = new Filt("Sepia", new Sepia(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1503 filters.Add(f);
1504 indexs[4, 26] = filters.Count;
1505 f = new Filt("SimplePosterization", new SimplePosterization(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1506 filters.Add(f);
1507 indexs[4, 27] = filters.Count;
1508 f = new Filt("SISThreshold", new SISThreshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1509 filters.Add(f);
1510 //f = new Filt("Texturer", new Texturer(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1511 //filters.Add(f);
1512 //f = new Filt("Threshold", new Threshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1513 //filters.Add(f);
1514 indexs[4, 28] = filters.Count;
1515 f = new Filt("ThresholdWithCarry", new ThresholdWithCarry(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1516 filters.Add(f);
1517 indexs[4, 29] = filters.Count;
1518 f = new Filt("VerticalRunLengthSmoothing", new VerticalRunLengthSmoothing(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1519 filters.Add(f);
1520 indexs[4, 30] = filters.Count;
1521 f = new Filt("YCbCrFiltering", new YCbCrFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1522 filters.Add(f);
1523 indexs[4, 31] = filters.Count;
1524 f = new Filt("YCbCrLinear", new YCbCrLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1525 filters.Add(f);
1526 //f = new Filt("YCbCrReplaceChannel", new YCbCrReplaceChannel(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1527 //filters.Add(f);
1528
1529 //BaseResizeFilter
1530 indexs[5, 0] = filters.Count;
1531 f = new Filt("ResizeBicubic", new ResizeBicubic(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1532 filters.Add(f);
1533 indexs[5, 1] = filters.Count;
1534 f = new Filt("ResizeBilinear", new ResizeBilinear(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1535 filters.Add(f);
1536 indexs[5, 2] = filters.Count;
1537 f = new Filt("ResizeNearestNeighbor", new ResizeNearestNeighbor(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1538 filters.Add(f);
1539
1540 //BaseRotateFilter
1541 indexs[6, 0] = filters.Count;
1542 f = new Filt("RotateBicubic", new RotateBicubic(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1543 filters.Add(f);
1544 indexs[6, 1] = filters.Count;
1545 f = new Filt("RotateBilinear", new RotateBilinear(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1546 filters.Add(f);
1547 indexs[6, 2] = filters.Count;
1548 f = new Filt("RotateNearestNeighbor", new RotateNearestNeighbor(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1549 filters.Add(f);
1550
1551 //Transformation
1552 indexs[7, 0] = filters.Count;
1553 f = new Filt("Crop", new Crop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1554 filters.Add(f);
1555 indexs[7, 1] = filters.Count;
1556 f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformation", new QuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1557 filters.Add(f);
1558 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear", new QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1559 //filters.Add(f);
1560 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor", new QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1561 //filters.Add(f);
1562 indexs[7, 2] = filters.Count;
1563 f = new Filt("Shrink", new Shrink(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1564 filters.Add(f);
1565 indexs[7, 3] = filters.Count;
1566 f = new Filt("SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation", new SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1567 filters.Add(f);
1568 indexs[7, 4] = filters.Count;
1569 f = new Filt("TransformFromPolar", new TransformFromPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1570 filters.Add(f);
1571 indexs[7, 5] = filters.Count;
1572 f = new Filt("TransformToPolar", new TransformToPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1573 filters.Add(f);
1574
1575 //BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter
1576 indexs[8, 0] = filters.Count;
1577 f = new Filt("BinaryDilatation3x3", new BinaryDilatation3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1578 filters.Add(f);
1579 indexs[8, 1] = filters.Count;
1580 f = new Filt("BilateralSmoothing ", new BilateralSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1581 filters.Add(f);
1582 indexs[8, 2] = filters.Count;
1583 f = new Filt("BinaryErosion3x3 ", new BinaryErosion3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1584 filters.Add(f);
1585
1586 }
1587 }
1588 public class ImageInfo
1589 {
1590 bool HasPhysicalXY = false;
1591 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
1592 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
1593 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
1594 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
1595 public double PhysicalSizeX
1596 {
1597 get { return physicalSizeX; }
1598 set
1599 {
1600 physicalSizeX = value;
1601 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1602 }
1603 }
1604 public double PhysicalSizeY
1605 {
1606 get { return physicalSizeY; }
1607 set
1608 {
1609 physicalSizeY = value;
1610 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1611 }
1612 }
1613 public double PhysicalSizeZ
1614 {
1615 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
1616 set
1617 {
1618 physicalSizeZ = value;
1619 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
1620 }
1621 }
1622
1623 bool HasStageXY = false;
1624 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
1625 public double stageSizeX = -1;
1626 public double stageSizeY = -1;
1627 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
1628 public double StageSizeX
1629 {
1630 get { return stageSizeX; }
1631 set
1632 {
1633 stageSizeX = value;
1634 HasStageXY = true;
1635 }
1636 }
1637 public double StageSizeY
1638 {
1639 get { return stageSizeY; }
1640 set
1641 {
1642 stageSizeY = value;
1643 HasStageXY = true;
1644 }
1645 }
1646 public double StageSizeZ
1647 {
1648 get { return stageSizeZ; }
1649 set
1650 {
1651 stageSizeZ = value;
1652 HasStageXYZ = true;
1653 }
1654 }
1655
1656 private int series = 0;
1657 public int Series
1658 {
1659 get { return series; }
1660 set { series = value; }
1661 }
1662
1666 public ImageInfo Copy()
1667 {
1668 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
1669 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
1670 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
1671 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
1672 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
1673 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
1674 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
1675 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
1676 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
1677 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
1678 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
1679 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
1680 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
1681 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
1682 return inf;
1683 }
1684
1685 }
1686 public class BioImage : IDisposable
1687 {
1688 public int[,,] Coords;
1689 private ZCT coordinate;
1690 public ZCT Coordinate
1691 {
1692 get
1693 {
1694 return coordinate;
1695 }
1696 set
1697 {
1698 coordinate = value;
1699 }
1700 }
1701
1702 private string id;
1703 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
1704 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
1705 public List<AForge.Bitmap> Buffers = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
1706 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();
1707 public int Resolution
1708 {
1709 get { return resolution; }
1710 set { resolution = value; }
1711 }
1712 public VolumeD Volume;
1713 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
1714 public string filename = "";
1715 public string script = "";
1716 public string Filename
1717 {
1718 get
1719 {
1720 return filename;
1721 }
1722 set
1723 {
1724 filename = value;
1725 }
1726 }
1727 public int[] rgbChannels = new int[3];
1728 public int RGBChannelCount
1729 {
1730 get
1731 {
1732 return Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount;
1733 }
1734 }
1735 public int bitsPerPixel;
1736 public int imagesPerSeries = 0;
1737 public int seriesCount = 1;
1738 public double frameInterval = 0;
1739 public bool littleEndian = false;
1740 public bool isGroup = false;
1741 public long loadTimeMS = 0;
1742 public long loadTimeTicks = 0;
1743 public bool selected = false;
1744 private bool ispyramidal = false;
1745 public Statistics Statistics
1746 {
1747 get
1748 {
1749 return statistics;
1750 }
1751 set
1752 {
1753 statistics = value;
1754 }
1755 }
1756 private int sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT;
1757 private Statistics statistics;
1758 private int resolution = 0;
1759 public static float progressValue = 0;
1760 ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
1765 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
1766 {
1767 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
1768 if (rois)
1769 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
1770 {
1771 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
1772 }
1773 foreach (Bitmap bf in b.Buffers)
1774 {
1775 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
1776 }
1777 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
1778 {
1779 bi.Channels.Add(c);
1780 }
1781 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
1782 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
1783 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
1784 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
1785 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
1786 bi.series = b.series;
1787 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
1788 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
1789 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
1790 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
1791 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
1792 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
1793 bi.file = b.file;
1794 bi.filename = b.filename;
1795 bi.Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
1796 bi.Resolutions.AddRange(b.Resolutions);
1797 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
1798 return bi;
1799 }
1805 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
1806 {
1807 return Copy(b, true);
1808 }
1814 public BioImage Copy(bool rois)
1815 {
1816 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
1817 }
1821 public BioImage Copy()
1822 {
1823 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
1824 }
1832 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
1833 {
1834 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
1835 if (copyAnnotations)
1836 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
1837 {
1838 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
1839 }
1840 if (copyChannels)
1841 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
1842 {
1843 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
1844 }
1845
1846 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
1847 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
1848 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
1849 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
1850 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
1851 bi.series = b.series;
1852 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
1853 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
1854 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
1855 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
1856 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
1857 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
1858 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
1859 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
1860 bi.file = b.file;
1861 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
1862 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
1863 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
1864 return bi;
1865 }
1866 public string ID
1867 {
1868 get { return id; }
1869 set { id = value; }
1870 }

1876 }

1885 }

1888 get { return Resolutions[Resolution].PhysicalSizeZ; }

1895 }

1900 get { return Resolutions[Resolution].StageSizeY; }
1901 set { imageInfo.StageSizeY = value; }

1906 set { imageInfo.StageSizeZ = value; }
1907 }

1914 }

1917 imageInfo.Series = value;
1918 }

1920
1921 static bool initialized = false;
1922 public Channel RChannel
1923 {
1924 get
1925 {
1926 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
1927 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
1928 else
1929 return Channels[0];
1930 }
1931 }
1932 public Channel GChannel
1933 {
1934 get
1935 {
1936 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
1937 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
1938 else
1939 return Channels[0];
1940 }
1941 }
1942 public Channel BChannel
1943 {
1944 get
1945 {
1946 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
1947 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
1948 else
1949 return Channels[0];
1950 }
1951 }
1952
1953 public class ImageJDesc
1954 {
1955 public string ImageJ;
1956 public int images = 0;
1957 public int channels = 0;
1958 public int slices = 0;
1959 public int frames = 0;
1960 public bool hyperstack;
1961 public string mode;
1962 public string unit;
1963 public double finterval = 0;
1964 public double spacing = 0;
1965 public bool loop;
1966 public double min = 0;
1967 public double max = 0;
1968 public int count;
1969 public bool bit8color = false;
1970
1979 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
1980 {
1981 ImageJ = "";
1982 images = b.ImageCount;
1983 channels = b.SizeC;
1984 slices = b.SizeZ;
1985 frames = b.SizeT;
1986 hyperstack = true;
1987 mode = "grayscale";
1988 unit = "micron";
1989 finterval = b.frameInterval;
1990 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
1991 loop = false;
1992 /*
1993 double dmax = double.MinValue;
1994 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
1995 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
1996 {
1997 if(dmax < c.Max)
1998 dmax = c.Max;
1999 if(dmin > c.Min)
2000 dmin = c.Min;
2001 }
2002 min = dmin;
2003 max = dmax;
2004 */
2005 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
2006 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
2007 return this;
2008 }
2012 public string GetString()
2013 {
2014 string s = "";
2015 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
2016 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
2017 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
2018 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
2019 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
2020 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
2021 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
2022 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
2023 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
2024 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
2025 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
2026 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
2027 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
2028 return s;
2029 }
2033 public void SetString(string desc)
2034 {
2035 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
2036 int maxlen = 20;
2037 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
2038 {
2039 if (i < maxlen)
2040 {
2041 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
2042 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
2043 ImageJ = sp[1];
2044 if (sp[0] == "images")
2045 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2046 if (sp[0] == "channels")
2047 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2048 if (sp[0] == "slices")
2049 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2050 if (sp[0] == "frames")
2051 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2052 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
2053 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2054 if (sp[0] == "mode")
2055 mode = sp[1];
2056 if (sp[0] == "unit")
2057 unit = sp[1];
2058 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
2059 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2060 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
2061 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2062 if (sp[0] == "loop")
2063 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2064 if (sp[0] == "min")
2065 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2066 if (sp[0] == "max")
2067 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2068 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
2069 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2070 }
2071 else
2072 return;
2073 }
2074
2075 }
2076 }
2077 public int SizeX
2078 {
2079 get
2080 {
2081 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2082 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
2083 else return 0;
2084 }
2085 }
2086 public int SizeY
2087 {
2088 get
2089 {
2090 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2091 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
2092 else return 0;
2093 }
2094 }
2095 public int SizeZ
2096 {
2097 get { return sizeZ; }
2098 }
2099 public int SizeC
2100 {
2101 get { return sizeC; }
2102 }
2103 public int SizeT
2104 {
2105 get { return sizeT; }
2106 }
2107 public static bool Planes = false;
2108 public IntRange RRange
2109 {
2110 get
2111 {
2112 return RChannel.RangeR;
2113 }
2114 }
2115 public IntRange GRange
2116 {
2117 get
2118 {
2119 return GChannel.RangeG;
2120 }
2121 }
2122 public IntRange BRange
2123 {
2124 get
2125 {
2126 return BChannel.RangeB;
2127 }
2128 }
2129 public Bitmap SelectedBuffer
2130 {
2131 get
2132 {
2133 return Buffers[Coords[Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T]];
2134 }
2135 }
2136 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
2137 public OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage? slideImage;
2138 public bool isRGB
2139 {
2140 get
2141 {
2142 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
2143 return true;
2144 else
2145 return false;
2146 }
2147 }
2148 public bool isTime
2149 {
2150 get
2151 {
2152 if (SizeT > 1)
2153 return true;
2154 else
2155 return false;
2156 }
2157 }
2158 public bool isSeries
2159 {
2160 get
2161 {
2162 if (seriesCount > 1)
2163 return true;
2164 else
2165 return false;
2166 }
2167 }
2168 public bool isPyramidal
2169 {
2170 get
2171 {
2172 return ispyramidal;
2173 }
2174 set
2175 {
2176 ispyramidal = value;
2177 }
2178 }
2179 public string file;
2180 public static string status;
2181 public static string progFile;
2182 public static bool Initialized
2183 {
2184 get
2185 {
2186 return initialized;
2187 }
2188 }
2189 public int? MacroResolution { get; set; }
2190 public int? LabelResolution { get; set; }
2191 public void SetLabelMacroResolutions()
2192 {
2193 int i = 0;
2194 AForge.Size s = new AForge.Size(int.MaxValue, int.MaxValue);
2195 bool noMacro = true;
2196 PixelFormat pf = Resolutions[0].PixelFormat;
2197 foreach (Resolution res in Resolutions)
2198 {
2199 if (res.SizeX < s.Width && res.SizeY < s.Height)
2200 {
2201 //If the pixel format changes it means this is the macro resolution.
2202 if (pf != res.PixelFormat)
2203 {
2204 noMacro = false;
2205 break;
2206 }
2207 pf = res.PixelFormat;
2208 s = new AForge.Size(res.SizeX, res.SizeY);
2209 }
2210 else
2211 {
2212 //If this level is bigger than the previous this is the macro resolution.
2213 noMacro = false;
2214 break;
2215 }
2216 i++;
2217 }
2218 if (!noMacro)
2219 {
2220 MacroResolution = i;
2221 LabelResolution = i + 1;
2222 }
2223
2224 }
2226 public void To8Bit()
2227 {
2228 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2229 To24Bit();
2230 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2231 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2232 return;
2233 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2234 {
2235 To24Bit();
2236 List<AForge.Bitmap> bfs = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2237 int index = 0;
2238 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2239 {
2240 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2241 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2242 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2243 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2244 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2245 {
2246 bs[b].Dispose();
2247 }
2248 bs = null;
2249 GC.Collect();
2250 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2251 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2252 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2253 bfs.Add(br);
2254 bfs.Add(bg);
2255 bfs.Add(bb);
2256 index += 3;
2257 }
2258 Buffers = bfs;
2259 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2260 }
2261 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2262 {
2263 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2264 int index = 0;
2265 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2266 {
2267 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2268 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2269 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2270 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2271 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2272 {
2273 bs[b].Dispose();
2274 bs[b] = null;
2275 }
2276 bs = null;
2277 GC.Collect();
2278 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2279 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2280 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2281 bfs.Add(br);
2282 bfs.Add(bg);
2283 bfs.Add(bb);
2284 index += 3;
2285 }
2286 Buffers = bfs;
2287 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2288 }
2289 else
2290 {
2291 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2292 {
2293 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2294 Buffers[i] = b;
2295 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2296 }
2297 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2298 {
2299 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2300 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2301 {
2302 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2303 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2304 }
2305 }
2306
2307 }
2308 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2309 do
2310 {
2311 Thread.Sleep(100);
2312 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2313 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2314 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2315 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2316 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2317 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2318 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To8Bit();");
2319 }
2321 public void To16Bit()
2322 {
2323 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2324 To24Bit();
2325 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2326 return;
2327 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2328 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2329 {
2330 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2331 int index = 0;
2332 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2333 {
2334 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
2335 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2336 bfs.AddRange(bs);
2337 index += 3;
2338 }
2339 Buffers = bfs;
2340 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
2341 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
2342 {
2343 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2344 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
2345 c.range = new IntRange[1];
2346 Channels.Clear();
2347 Channels.Add(c);
2348 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2349 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2350 Channels[1].Index = 1;
2351 Channels[2].Index = 2;
2352 }
2353 }
2354 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2355 {
2356 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2357 {
2358 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2359 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2360 }
2361 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2362 {
2363 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2364 {
2365 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2366 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2367 }
2368 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2369 }
2370 }
2371 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2372 {
2373 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2374 int index = 0;
2375 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2376 {
2377 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2378 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2379 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2380 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2381 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2382 {
2383 bs[b].Dispose();
2384 bs[b] = null;
2385 }
2386 bs = null;
2387 GC.Collect();
2388 br.To16Bit();
2389 bg.To16Bit();
2390 bb.To16Bit();
2391 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2392 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2393 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2394 bfs.Add(br);
2395 bfs.Add(bg);
2396 bfs.Add(bb);
2397 index += 3;
2398 }
2399 Buffers = bfs;
2400 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2401 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2402 {
2403 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2404 {
2405 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2406 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2407 }
2408 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2409 }
2410 }
2411 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2412 do
2413 {
2414 Thread.Sleep(100);
2415 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2416 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2417 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2418 StackThreshold(true);
2419 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2420 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2421 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To16Bit();");
2422 }
2424 public void To24Bit()
2425 {
2426 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2427 return;
2428 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2429 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
2430 {
2431 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2432 {
2433 Buffers[i] = Bitmap.To24Bit(Buffers[i]);
2434 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
2435 }
2436 if (Channels.Count == 4)
2437 {
2438 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
2439 }
2440 else
2441 {
2442 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2443 }
2444 }
2445 else
2446 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2447 {
2448 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
2449 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2450 {
2451 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2452 }
2453 }
2454 else
2455 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2456 {
2457 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2458 {
2459 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2460 {
2461 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2462 }
2463 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2464 {
2465 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2466 {
2467 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2468 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2469 }
2470 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2471 }
2472 }
2473 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2474 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2475 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2476 {
2477 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2478 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2479 bs.Dispose();
2480 bs = null;
2481 bfs.Add(bbs);
2482 }
2483 else
2484 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2485 {
2486 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2487 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2488 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2489 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2490 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
2491 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
2492 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2493 {
2494 if (bs[b] != null)
2495 bs[b].Dispose();
2496 bs[b] = null;
2497 }
2498 bfs.Add(bbs);
2499 }
2500 Buffers = bfs;
2501 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2502 }
2503 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To24Bit();");
2504 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2505 StackThreshold(false);
2506 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2507 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2508 }
2510 public void To32Bit()
2511 {
2512 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2513 return;
2514 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2515 {
2516 To24Bit();
2517 }
2518 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2519 {
2520 UnmanagedImage b = Bitmap.To32Bit(Buffers[i]);
2521 Buffers[i].Image = b;
2522 }
2523 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2524 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2525 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2526 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To32Bit();");
2527 }
2531 public void To48Bit()
2532 {
2533 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2534 To24Bit();
2535 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2536 return;
2537 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2538 {
2539 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2540 {
2541 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2542 {
2543 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2544 }
2545 }
2546 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2547 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2548 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2549 {
2550 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2551 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2552 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
2553 bs.Dispose();
2554 bs = null;
2555 bfs.Add(bbs);
2556 }
2557 else
2558 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2559 {
2560 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2561 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
2562 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2563 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2564 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2565 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2566 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2567 {
2568 if (bs[b] != null)
2569 bs[b].Dispose();
2570 bs[b] = null;
2571 }
2572 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
2573 bfs.Add(bbs);
2574 }
2575 GC.Collect();
2576 Buffers = bfs;
2577 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2578 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2579 c.SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2580 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
2581 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
2582 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
2583 Channels.Clear();
2584 Channels.Add(c);
2585 }
2586 else
2587 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2588 {
2589 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2590 {
2591 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2592 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2593 }
2594 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2595 {
2596 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2597 {
2598 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2599 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2600 }
2601 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2602 }
2603 }
2604 else
2605 {
2606 int index = 0;
2607 List<Bitmap> buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
2608 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
2609 {
2610 Bitmap[] bf = new Bitmap[3];
2611 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
2612 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
2613 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
2614 Bitmap inf = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bf);
2615 buffers.Add(inf);
2616 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
2617 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2618 {
2619 bf[b].Dispose();
2620 }
2621 index++;
2622 }
2623 Buffers = buffers;
2624 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2625 }
2626 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2627 do
2628 {
2629 Thread.Sleep(50);
2630 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2631 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2632 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2633 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2634 StackThreshold(true);
2635 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2636 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2637 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To48Bit();");
2638 }
2642 public void RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType rot)
2643 {
2644 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2645 {
2646 Buffers[i].RotateFlip(rot);
2647 }
2648 Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ), new Point3D(PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
2649 }
2658 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)
2659 {
2660 Bake(new IntRange(rmin, rmax), new IntRange(gmin, gmax), new IntRange(bmin, bmax));
2661 }
2668 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
2669 {
2670 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
2671 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
2672 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2673 {
2674 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
2675 UnmanagedImage b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
2676 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(bm.ID, b, co, i);
2677 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
2678 bm.Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = i;
2679 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
2680 }
2681 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
2682 {
2683 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
2684 {
2685 item.range[i].Min = 0;
2686 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
2687 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
2688 else
2689 item.range[i].Max = 255;
2690 }
2691 }
2692 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2693 do
2694 {
2695 Thread.Sleep(50);
2696 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2697 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
2698 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2699 Images.AddImage(bm, true);
2700 App.tabsView.AddTab(bm);
2701 Recorder.AddLine("ImageView.SelectedImage.Bake(" + rf.Min + "," + rf.Max + "," + gf.Min + "," + gf.Max + "," + bf.Min + "," + bf.Max + ");");
2702 }
2704 public void UpdateCoords()
2705 {
2706 int z = 0;
2707 int c = 0;
2708 int t = 0;
2709 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
2710 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
2711 {
2712 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
2713 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
2714 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
2715 if (c < SizeC - 1)
2716 c++;
2717 else
2718 {
2719 c = 0;
2720 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
2721 z++;
2722 else
2723 {
2724 z = 0;
2725 if (t < SizeT - 1)
2726 t++;
2727 else
2728 t = 0;
2729 }
2730 }
2731 }
2732 }
2739 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st)
2740 {
2741 int z = 0;
2742 int c = 0;
2743 int t = 0;
2744 sizeZ = sz;
2745 sizeC = sc;
2746 sizeT = st;
2747 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
2748 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
2749 {
2750 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
2751 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
2752 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
2753 if (c < SizeC - 1)
2754 c++;
2755 else
2756 {
2757 c = 0;
2758 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
2759 z++;
2760 else
2761 {
2762 z = 0;
2763 if (t < SizeT - 1)
2764 t++;
2765 else
2766 t = 0;
2767 }
2768 }
2769 }
2770 }
2777 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st, string order)
2778 {
2779 int z = 0;
2780 int c = 0;
2781 int t = 0;
2782 sizeZ = sz;
2783 sizeC = sc;
2784 sizeT = st;
2785 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
2786 if (order == "XYCZT")
2787 {
2788 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
2789 {
2790 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
2791 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
2792 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
2793 if (c < SizeC - 1)
2794 c++;
2795 else
2796 {
2797 c = 0;
2798 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
2799 z++;
2800 else
2801 {
2802 z = 0;
2803 if (t < SizeT - 1)
2804 t++;
2805 else
2806 t = 0;
2807 }
2808 }
2809 }
2810 }
2811 else if (order == "XYZCT")
2812 {
2813 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
2814 {
2815 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
2816 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
2817 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
2818 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
2819 z++;
2820 else
2821 {
2822 z = 0;
2823 if (c < SizeC - 1)
2824 c++;
2825 else
2826 {
2827 c = 0;
2828 if (t < SizeT - 1)
2829 t++;
2830 else
2831 t = 0;
2832 }
2833 }
2834 }
2835 }
2836 }
2842 public double ToImageSizeX(double d)
2843 {
2844 return d / PhysicalSizeX;
2845 }
2852 public double ToImageSizeY(double d)
2853 {
2854 return d / PhysicalSizeY;
2855 }
2861 public double ToImageSpaceX(double x)
2862 {
2863 if (isPyramidal)
2864 return x;
2865 return (float)((x - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
2866 }
2872 public double ToImageSpaceY(double y)
2873 {
2874 if (isPyramidal)
2875 return y;
2876 return (float)((y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
2877 }
2883 public PointD ToImageSpace(PointD p)
2884 {
2885 PointD pp = new PointD();
2886 pp.X = (float)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
2887 pp.Y = (float)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
2888 return pp;
2889 }
2895 public PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p)
2896 {
2897 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
2898 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
2899 {
2900 PointD pp = new PointD();
2901 pp.X = ((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
2902 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
2903 ps[i] = pp;
2904 }
2905 return ps;
2906 }
2913 public PointF[] ToImageSpace(PointF[] p)
2914 {
2915 PointF[] ps = new PointF[p.Length];
2916 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
2917 {
2918 PointF pp = new PointF();
2919 pp.X = (float)((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
2920 pp.Y = (float)((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
2921 ps[i] = pp;
2922 }
2923 return ps;
2924 }
2930 public RectangleF ToImageSpace(RectangleD p)
2931 {
2932 RectangleF r = new RectangleF();
2933 Point pp = new Point();
2934 r.X = (int)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
2935 r.Y = (int)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
2936 r.Width = (int)(p.W / PhysicalSizeX);
2937 r.Height = (int)(p.H / PhysicalSizeY);
2938 return r;
2939 }
2945 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p)
2946 {
2947 PointD pp = new PointD();
2948 if (isPyramidal)
2949 {
2950 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
2951 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
2952 return pp;
2953 }
2954 else
2955 {
2956 pp.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
2957 pp.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
2958 return pp;
2959 }
2960 }
2967 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, int resolution)
2968 {
2969 PointD pp = new PointD();
2970 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
2971 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
2972 return pp;
2973 }
2984 public static PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
2985 {
2986 PointD pp = new PointD();
2987 pp.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
2988 pp.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
2989 return pp;
2990 }
2997 public RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p)
2998 {
2999 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3000 r.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3001 r.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3002 r.W = (p.W * PhysicalSizeX);
3003 r.H = (p.H * PhysicalSizeY);
3004 return r;
3005 }
3016 public static RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3017 {
3018 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3019 r.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3020 r.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3021 r.W = (p.W * physicalSizeX);
3022 r.H = (p.H * physicalSizeY);
3023 return r;
3024 }
3031 public PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p)
3032 {
3033 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3034 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3035 {
3036 PointD pp = new PointD();
3037 pp.X = ((p[i].X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3038 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3039 ps[i] = pp;
3040 }
3041 return ps;
3042 }
3054 public static PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3055 {
3056 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3057 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3058 {
3059 PointD pp = new PointD();
3060 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3061 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3062 ps[i] = pp;
3063 }
3064 return ps;
3065 }
3066 /* Creating a new BioImage object. */
3067 public BioImage(string file)
3068 {
3069 id = file;
3070 this.file = file;
3071 filename = Images.GetImageName(id);
3072 Coordinate = new ZCT();
3073 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
3074 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
3075 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
3076 }
3090 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
3091 {
3092 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
3093 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
3094 int i = 0;
3095 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
3096 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
3097 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
3098 b.sizeT = te - ts;
3099 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
3100 {
3101 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
3102 {
3103 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
3104 {
3105 int ind = orig.Coords[zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti];
3106 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
3107 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3108 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
3109 b.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3110 i++;
3111 }
3112 }
3113 }
3114 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
3115 {
3116 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
3117 }
3118 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3119 do
3120 {
3121 Thread.Sleep(100);
3122 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3123 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3124 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3125 AutoThreshold(b, false);
3126 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3127 b.StackThreshold(true);
3128 else
3129 b.StackThreshold(false);
3130 Images.AddImage(b, true);
3131 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Substack(" + '"' + orig.Filename + '"' + "," + ser + "," + zs + "," + ze + "," + cs + "," + ce + "," + ts + "," + te + ");");
3132 return b;
3133 }
3140 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
3141 {
3142 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
3143 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
3144 res.series = b2.series;
3145 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
3146 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
3147 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
3148 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
3149 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
3150 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
3151 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
3152 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
3153 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
3154 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
3155
3156 int i = 0;
3157 int cc = 0;
3158 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
3159 {
3160 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
3161 {
3162 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3163 {
3164 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
3165 if (ci < cOrig)
3166 {
3167 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
3168 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3169 if (b2.littleEndian)
3170 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3171 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3172 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
3173 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3174 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3175 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
3176 if (anns.Count > 0)
3177 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3178 }
3179 else
3180 {
3181 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
3182 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3183 if (b2.littleEndian)
3184 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3185 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3186 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
3187 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3188
3189 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3190 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
3191 if (anns.Count > 0)
3192 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3193 }
3194 i++;
3195 }
3196 }
3197 }
3198 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3199 {
3200 if (ci < cOrig)
3201 {
3202 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
3203 }
3204 else
3205 {
3206 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
3207 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
3208 cc++;
3209 }
3210 }
3211 Images.AddImage(res, true);
3212 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3213 do
3214 {
3215 Thread.Sleep(100);
3216 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3217 AutoThreshold(res, false);
3218 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3219 res.StackThreshold(true);
3220 else
3221 res.StackThreshold(false);
3222 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeChannels(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + "," + '"' + b2.ID + '"' + ");");
3223 return res;
3224 }
3231 public static BioImage MergeChannels(string bname, string b2name)
3232 {
3233 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(bname);
3234 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);
3235 return MergeChannels(b, b2);
3236 }
3242 public static BioImage MergeZ(BioImage b)
3243 {
3244 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3245 int ind = 0;
3246 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3247 {
3248 for (int t = 0; t < b.sizeT; t++)
3249 {
3250 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.Coords[0, c, t]]);
3251 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3252 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeZ; i++)
3253 {
3254 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3255 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.Coords[i, c, t]]);
3256 }
3257 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(0, c, t), ind);
3258 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3259 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3260 ind++;
3261 }
3262 }
3263 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3264 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3265 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3266 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3267 do
3268 {
3269 Thread.Sleep(100);
