3270 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3271 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3272 bi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3273
3274 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3275 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3276 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3277 else
3278 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3279 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeZ(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
3280 return bi;
3281 }
3287 public static BioImage MergeT(BioImage b)
3288 {
3289 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3290 int ind = 0;
3291 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3292 {
3293 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
3294 {
3295 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, 0]]);
3296 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3297 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)
3298 {
3299 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3300 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, i]]);
3301 }
3302 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
3303 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3304 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3305 ind++;
3306 }
3307 }
3308 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3309 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3310 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3311 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3312 do
3313 {
3314 Thread.Sleep(100);
3315 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3316 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3317 bi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3318 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3319 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3320 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3321 else
3322 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3323 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeT(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
3324 return bi;
3325 }
3329 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
3330 {
3331 BioImage[] bms;
3332 if (isRGB)
3333 {
3334 bms = new BioImage[3];
3335 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3336 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3337 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3338 ri.sizeC = 1;
3339 gi.sizeC = 1;
3340 bi.sizeC = 1;
3341 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3342 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3343 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3344 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
3345 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
3346 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
3347
3348 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3349 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3350 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3351 int ind = 0;
3352 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
3353 {
3354 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3355 {
3356 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
3357 Bitmap[] bfs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
3358 ind += 3;
3359 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
3360 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
3361 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
3362 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
3363 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
3364 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
3365 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3366 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3367 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3368 }
3369 else
3370 {
3371
3372 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3373 Bitmap rbf = new Bitmap(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3374 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
3375 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
3376 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3377
3378 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3379 Bitmap gbf = new Bitmap(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3380 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
3381 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
3382 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3383
3384 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3385 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
3386 Bitmap bbf = new Bitmap(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3387 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
3388 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
3389 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3390
3391 }
3392 }
3393 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3394 do
3395 {
3396 Thread.Sleep(100);
3397 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3398 ri.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3399 gi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3400 bi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3401 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3402 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3403 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3404 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
3405 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
3406 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3407 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
3408 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
3409 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3410 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3411 bms[0] = ri;
3412 bms[1] = gi;
3413 bms[2] = bi;
3414 }
3415 else
3416 {
3417 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
3418 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
3419 {
3420 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
3421 bms[c] = b;
3422 }
3423 }
3424
3425 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3426 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.SplitChannels(" + '"' + Filename + '"' + ");");
3427 return bms;
3428 }
3434 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(BioImage bb)
3435 {
3436 return bb.SplitChannels();
3437 }
3443 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(string name)
3444 {
3445 return SplitChannels(Images.GetImage(name));
3446 }
3447
3448 /* Creating a new instance of the LevelsLinear class. */
3449 public static LevelsLinear filter8 = new LevelsLinear();
3450 public static LevelsLinear16bpp filter16 = new LevelsLinear16bpp();
3451 private static ExtractChannel extractR = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
3452 private static ExtractChannel extractG = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.G);
3453 private static ExtractChannel extractB = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
3454
3462 public Bitmap GetImageByCoord(int z, int c, int t)
3463 {
3464 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]];
3465 }
3475 public Bitmap GetBitmap(int z, int c, int t)
3476 {
3477 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]];
3478 }
3509 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
3510 {
3511 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
3512 return 0;
3513 int stridex = SizeX;
3514 int x = ix;
3515 int y = iy;
3516 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
3517 {
3518 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
3519 }
3520 else
3521 {
3522 return (y * stridex + x);
3523 }
3524 }
3532 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
3533 {
3534 int stridex = SizeX;
3535 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
3536 int x = ix;
3537 int y = iy;
3538 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
3539 {
3540 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
3541 }
3542 else
3543 {
3544 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
3545 }
3546 }
3553 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
3554 {
3555 if (coord.X < 0 || coord.Y < 0 || coord.X > SizeX || coord.Y > SizeY)
3556 {
3557 return 0;
3558 }
3559 if (isRGB)
3560 {
3561 if (coord.C == 0)
3562 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
3563 else if (coord.C == 1)
3564 return GetValueRGB(coord, 1);
3565 else if (coord.C == 2)
3566 return GetValueRGB(coord, 2);
3567 }
3568 else
3569 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
3570 return 0;
3571 }
3578 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
3579 {
3580 int ind = 0;
3581 if (coord.C >= SizeC)
3582 {
3583 coord.C = 0;
3584 }
3585 ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3586 ColorS c = Buffers[ind].GetPixel(coord.X, coord.Y);
3587 if (index == 0)
3588 return c.R;
3589 else
3590 if (index == 1)
3591 return c.G;
3592 else
3593 if (index == 2)
3594 return c.B;
3595 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();
3596 }
3604 public ushort GetValue(ZCT coord, int x, int y)
3605 {
3606 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y), 0);
3607 }
3617 public ushort GetValue(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
3618 {
3619 return GetValue(new ZCTXY(z, c, t, x, y));
3620 }
3629 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCT coord, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
3630 {
3631 ZCTXY c = new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y);
3632 if (isRGB)
3633 {
3634 return GetValueRGB(c, RGBindex);
3635 }
3636 else
3637 return GetValue(coord, x, y);
3638 }
3650 public ushort GetValueRGB(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
3651 {
3652 return GetValueRGB(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y, RGBindex);
3653 }
3658 public void SetValue(ZCTXY coord, ushort value)
3659 {
3660 int i = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3661 Buffers[i].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, value);
3662 }
3669 public void SetValue(int x, int y, int ind, ushort value)
3670 {
3671 Buffers[ind].SetValue(x, y, value);
3672 }
3679 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ZCT coord, ushort value)
3680 {
3681 SetValue(x, y, Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], value);
3682 }
3689 public void SetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int RGBindex, ushort value)
3690 {
3691 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3692 Buffers[ind].SetValueRGB(coord.X, coord.Y, RGBindex, value);
3693 }
3699 public Bitmap GetBitmap(ZCT coord)
3700 {
3701 return (Bitmap)GetImageByCoord(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
3702 }
3711 public Bitmap GetFiltered(ZCT coord, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
3712 {
3713 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3714 return GetFiltered(index, r, g, b);
3715 }
3724 public Bitmap GetFiltered(int ind, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
3725 {
3726 if (Buffers[ind].BitsPerPixel > 8)
3727 {
3728 BioImage.filter16.InRed = r;
3729 BioImage.filter16.InGreen = g;
3730 BioImage.filter16.InBlue = b;
3731 return BioImage.filter16.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
3732 }
3733 else
3734 {
3735 // set ranges
3736 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
3737 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
3738 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
3739 return BioImage.filter8.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
3740 }
3741 }
3746 public UnmanagedImage GetChannelImage(int ind, short s)
3747 {
3748 Bitmap bf = Buffers[ind];
3749 if (bf.isRGB)
3750 {
3751 if (s == 0)
3752 return extractR.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
3753 else
3754 if (s == 1)
3755 return extractG.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
3756 else
3757 return extractB.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
3758 }
3759 else
3760 throw new InvalidOperationException();
3761 }
3771 public Bitmap GetEmission(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
3772 {
3773 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
3774 {
3775 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[Channels.Count];
3776 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
3777 {
3778 int index = Coords[coord.Z, c, coord.T];
3779 bs[c] = Buffers[index];
3780 }
3781 Bitmap bm = (Bitmap)Bitmap.GetEmissionBitmap(bs, Channels.ToArray());
3782 return bm;
3783 }
3784 else
3785 {
3786 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3787 return Buffers[index];
3788 }
3789 }
3798 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
3799 {
3800 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3801 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3802 {
3803 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
3804 {
3805 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3806 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
3807 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
3808 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
3809 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
3810 }
3811 else
3812 {
3813 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3814 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
3815 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
3816 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
3817 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
3818 }
3819 }
3820 else
3821 return Buffers[index];
3822 }
3831 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
3832 {
3833 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
3834 {
3835 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3836 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3837 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3838 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3839 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3840 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3841 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3842 {
3843 //getting the pixels of current row
3844 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3845 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
3846 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3847 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3848 {
3849 int indexRGB = x * 4;
3850 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3851 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
3852 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3853 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3854 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3855 }
3856 }
3857 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3858 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3859 return bmp;
3860 }
3861 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3862 {
3863 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3864 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3865 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3866 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3867 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3868 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3869 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3870 {
3871 //getting the pixels of current row
3872 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3873 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
3874 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3875 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3876 {
3877 int indexRGB = x * 3;
3878 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3879 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
3880 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3881 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3882 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3883 }
3884 }
3885 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3886 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3887 return bmp;
3888 }
3889 else
3890 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3891 {
3892 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3893 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3894 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3895 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3896 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3897 unsafe
3898 {
3899 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3900 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3901 {
3902 //getting the pixels of current row
3903 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3904 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
3905 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3906 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3907 {
3908 int indexRGB = x * 6;
3909 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3910 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
3911 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
3912 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
3913 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3914 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3915 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3916 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3917 }
3918 }
3919 }
3920 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3921 return bmp;
3922 }
3923 else
3924 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3925 {
3926 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3927 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3928 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3929 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3930 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3931 unsafe
3932 {
3933 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3934 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3935 {
3936 //getting the pixels of current row
3937 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3938 int rowRGB = y * w;
3939 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3940 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3941 {
3942 int indexRGB = x;
3943 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3944 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
3945 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3946 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3947 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3948 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3949 }
3950 }
3951 }
3952 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3953 return bmp;
3954 }
3955 else
3956 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3957 {
3958 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3959 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3960 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3961 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3962 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3963 unsafe
3964 {
3965 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3966 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3967 {
3968 //getting the pixels of current row
3969 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3970 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
3971 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3972 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3973 {
3974 int indexRGB = x * 2;
3975 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3976 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
3977 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3978 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3979 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3980 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3981 }
3982 }
3983 }
3984 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3985 return bmp;
3986 }
3987
3988 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
3989 }
3990 public static Stopwatch swatch = new Stopwatch();
3997 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)
3998 {
3999 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4000 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4001 {
4002 if (an == null)
4003 continue;
4004 if (an.coord == coord)
4005 annotations.Add(an);
4006 }
4007 return annotations;
4008 }
4017 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(int Z, int C, int T)
4018 {
4019 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4020 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4021 {
4022 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
4023 annotations.Add(an);
4024 }
4025 return annotations;
4026 }
4027
4028 public bool Loading = false;
4031 public static void Initialize()
4032 {
4033 if (!OMESupport())
4034 return;
4035 //We initialize OME on a seperate thread so the user doesn't have to wait for initialization to
4036 //view images.
4037 System.Threading.Thread t = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitOME));
4038 t.Start();
4039 }
4041 private static void InitOME()
4042 {
4043 factory = new ServiceFactory();
4044 service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
4045 reader = new ImageReader();
4046 writer = new ImageWriter();
4047 initialized = true;
4048 }
4054 public static void SaveFile(string file, string ID)
4055 {
4056 string[] sts = new string[1];
4057 sts[0] = ID;
4058 SaveSeries(sts, file);
4059 }
4064 public static void SaveSeries(string[] IDs, string file)
4065 {
4066 string desc = "";
4067 int stride = 0;
4068 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
4069 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(IDs[0]);
4070 j.FromImage(bi);
4071 desc = j.GetString();
4072 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4073 {
4074 string id = IDs[fi];
4075 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4076 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(id);
4077 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4078 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
4079
4080 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
4081 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
4082 {
4083 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4084 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
4085 }
4086
4087 //Embed ROI's to image description.
4088 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
4089 {
4090 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
4091 }
4092 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
4093 {
4094 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
4095 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
4096 }
4097 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
4098 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
4099 }
4100
4101 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "w");
4102 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4103 {
4104 int im = 0;
4105 string id = IDs[fi];
4106 //Progress pr = new //Progress(file, "Saving");
4107 //pr.Show();
4108 //Application.DoEvents();
4109 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4110 int sizec = 1;
4111 if (!b.isRGB)
4112 {
4113 sizec = b.SizeC;
4114 }
4115 byte[] buffer;
4116 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
4117 {
4118 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4119 {
4120 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4121 {
4122 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
4123 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
4124 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
4125 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
4126 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
4127 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
4128 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
4129 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
4130 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
4131 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
4132 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
4133 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
4134 {
4135 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
4136 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
4137 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
4138 }
4139 else
4140 {
4141 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4142 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4143 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
4144 }
4145 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
4146 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
4147 // specify the page number
4148 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
4149 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
4150 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
4151 {
4152 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
4153 offset += stride;
4154 }
4155 image.WriteDirectory();
4156 //pr.Update//ProgressF((float)im / (float)b.ImageCount);
4157 //Application.DoEvents();
4158 im++;
4159 }
4160 }
4161 }
4162 //pr.Close();
4163 }
4164 image.Dispose();
4165
4166 }
4173 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file, bool tab)
4174 {
4175 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4176 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
4177 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4178 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4179 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4180 int count = 1;
4181 if (f != null)
4182 {
4183 string desc = f[0].ToString();
4184 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4185 {
4186 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4187 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4188 count = imDesc.channels;
4189 }
4190 }
4191 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
4192 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
4193 image.Close();
4194 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
4195 {
4196 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, tab, true);
4197 }
4198 return bs;
4199 }
4205 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file)
4206 {
4207 return OpenFile(file, 0, false, true);
4208 }
4209 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, bool tab)
4210 {
4211 return OpenFile(file, 0, tab, true);
4212 }
4219 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages)
4220 {
4221 return OpenFile(file, series, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
4222 }
4223 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
4224 {
4225 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
4226 {
4227 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
4228 {
4229 if (tiff == null)
4230 {
4231 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
4232 }
4233 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
4234 tiff.Close();
4235 return t;
4236 }
4237 }
4238 else return false;
4239 }
4249 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
4250 {
4251 Resolution res = new Resolution();
4252 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
4253 string unit = "NONE";
4254 if (rs != null)
4255 unit = rs[0].ToString();
4256 if (jdesc != null)
4257 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
4258 else
4259 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4260 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
4261 {
4262 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4263 {
4264 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4265 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
4266 }
4267 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4268 {
4269 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4270 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
4271 }
4272 }
4273 else
4274 if (unit == "INCH")
4275 {
4276 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4277 {
4278 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4279 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4280 }
4281 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4282 {
4283 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4284 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4285 }
4286 }
4287 else
4288 if (unit == "NONE")
4289 {
4290 if (jdesc != null)
4291 {
4292 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
4293 {
4294 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4295 {
4296 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4297 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4298 }
4299 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4300 {
4301 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4302 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4303 }
4304 }
4305 }
4306 else
4307 {
4308 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
4309 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
4310 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4311 }
4312 }
4313 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4314 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4315 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4316 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4317 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
4318 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
4319 }
4345 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tileX, int tileY, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
4346 {
4347 string fs = file.Replace("\\", "/");
4348 vips = VipsSupport(file);
4349 Console.WriteLine("Opening BioImage: " + file);
4350 bool ome = isOME(file);
4351 if (ome) return OpenOME(file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
4352 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
4353 Console.WriteLine("IsTiled=" + tiled.ToString());
4354 tile = tiled;
4355
4356 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
4357 st.Start();
4358 status = "Opening Image";
4359 progFile = file;
4360 progressValue = 0;
4361 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
4362 if (tiled && file.EndsWith(".tif") && !file.EndsWith(".ome.tif"))
4363 {
4364 //To open this we need libvips
4365 vips = VipsSupport(b.file);
4366 }
4367 b.series = series;
4368 b.file = file;
4369 b.ispyramidal = tiled;
4370 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
4371 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4372 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
4373 {
4374 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4375 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
4376 }
4377 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
4378 {
4379 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4380 b.tifRead = image;
4381 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4382 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4383 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4384 b.littleEndian = !image.IsBigEndian();
4385 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4386 string desc = "";
4387
4388 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4389 desc = f[0].ToString();
4390 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
4391 b.sizeC = 1;
4392 b.sizeT = 1;
4393 b.sizeZ = 1;
4394 if (f != null && !tile)
4395 {
4396 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4397 desc = f[0].ToString();
4398 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4399 {
4400 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4401 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4402 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
4403 else
4404 b.sizeC = 1;
4405 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
4406 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
4407 else
4408 b.sizeZ = 1;
4409 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
4410 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
4411 else
4412 b.sizeT = 1;
4413 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
4414 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
4415 else
4416 b.frameInterval = 1;
4417 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
4418 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
4419 else
4420 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
4421 }
4422 }
4423 int stride = 0;
4424 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
4425 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
4426 {
4427 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4428 {
4429 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
4430 stride = SizeX * 2;
4431 }
4432 else
4433 {
4434 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
4435 stride = SizeX;
4436 }
4437 }
4438 else
4439 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
4440 {
4441 b.sizeC = 1;
4442 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4443 {
4444 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
4445 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
4446 }
4447 else
4448 {
4449 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
4450 stride = SizeX * 3;
4451 }
4452 }
4453 else
4454 {
4455 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
4456 stride = SizeX * 4;
4457 }
4458
4459 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
4460 int index = 0;
4461 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
4462 {
4463 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
4464 {
4465 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
4466 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4467 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4468 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
4469 {
4470 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4471 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
4472 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
4473 ch.info = info;
4474 b.Channels.Add(ch);
4475 if (index == 0)
4476 {
4477 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
4478 }
4479 else
4480 if (index == 1)
4481 {
4482 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
4483 }
4484 else
4485 if (index == 2)
4486 {
4487 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
4488 }
4489 index++;
4490 }
4491 }
4492 else
4493 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
4494 {
4495 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
4496 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4497 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4498 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
4499 {
4500 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
4501 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
4502 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
4503 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
4504 }
4505 }
4506 else
4507 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
4508 {
4509 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
4510 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4511 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4512 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
4513 {
4514 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4515 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
4516 }
4517 }
4518 }
4519 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
4520 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
4521 {
4522 tileSizeX = 1920;
4523 tileSizeY = 1080;
4524 }
4525
4526 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
4527 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
4528 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
4529
4530 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
4531 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
4532 {
4533 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
4534 {
4535 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
4536 }
4537 }
4538
4539 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
4540 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
4541 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
4542 bool inter = true;
4543 if (stride != str)
4544 inter = false;
4545 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
4546 if (tiled)
4547 {
4548 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
4549 if (vips)
4550 OpenVips(b, b.Resolutions.Count);
4551 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4552 {
4553 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
4554 {
4555 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4556 {
4557 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
4558 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
4559 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bmp);
4560 }
4561 }
4562 }
4563 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
4564 }
4565 else
4566 {
4567 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
4568 {
4569 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
4570
4571 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
4572 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
4573 {
4574 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
4575 offset += stride;
4576 }
4577 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
4578 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
4579 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
4580 progressValue = (float)p / (float)(series + 1) * pages;
4581 }
4582 }
4583 image.Close();
4584 b.UpdateCoords();
4585 }
4586 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
4587 {
4588 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
4589 b.StageSizeX = 0;
4590 b.StageSizeY = 0;
4591 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
4592 }
4593 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
4594
4595 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
4596 if (ome && OmeSupport)
4597 {
4598 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
4599 }
4600
4601 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
4602 do
4603 {
4604 Thread.Sleep(50);
4605 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
4606 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
4607 AutoThreshold(b, false);
4608 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4609 b.StackThreshold(true);
4610 else
4611 b.StackThreshold(false);
4612 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Open(" + '"' + file + '"' + ");");
4613 if (addToImages)
4614 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
4615 //pr.Close();
4616 //pr.Dispose();
4617 st.Stop();
4618 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
4619 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
4620 return b;
4621 }
4628 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
4629 {
4630 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4631 string desc = "";
4632 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4633 image.Close();
4634 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
4635 int index = 0;
4636 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
4637 {
4638 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
4639 {
4640 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
4641 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4642 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4643 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
4644 {
4645 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4646 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
4647 if (info.Series > 1)
4648 return true;
4649 else
4650 return false;
4651 }
4652 }
4653 }
4654 return false;
4655 }
4663 public static bool isOME(string file)
4664 {
4665 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
4666 {
4667 return true;
4668 }
4669 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
4670 {
4671 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4672 string desc = "";
4673 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4674 desc = f[0].ToString();
4675 image.Close();
4676 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
4677 return true;
4678 else
4679 return false;
4680 }
4681 if (!(file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
4682 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
4683 {
4684 return true;
4685 }
4686 else return false;
4687 }
4693 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
4694 {
4695 if (!isOME(file))
4696 return false;
4697 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
4698 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
4699 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
4700 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
4701 reader.setId(file);
4702 bool ser = false;
4703 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
4704 ser = true;
4705 reader.close();
4706 reader = null;
4707 return ser;
4708 }
4714 public static void SaveOME(string file, string ID)
4715 {
4716 if (!OMESupport())
4717 return;
4718 string[] sts = new string[1];
4719 sts[0] = ID;
4720 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
4721 }
4727 public static void SaveOMESeries(BioImage[] bms, string f, bool planes)
4728 {
4729 if (!OMESupport())
4730 return;
4731 if (File.Exists(f))
4732 File.Delete(f);
4733 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
4734 status = "Saving OME Image Metadata.";
4735 for (int fi = 0; fi < bms.Length; fi++)
4736 {
4737 progFile = bms[fi].file;
4738 int serie = fi;
4739 string file = bms[fi].file;
4740
4741 BioImage b = bms[fi];
4742 if (b.isPyramidal)
4743 {
4744 b = OpenOME(b.file, b.resolution, false, false, true, (int)App.viewer.PyramidalOrigin.X, (int)App.viewer.PyramidalOrigin.Y, App.viewer.Width, App.viewer.Height);
4745 }
4746 // create OME-XML metadata store
4747
4748 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
4749 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
4750 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
4751 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
4752 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4753 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
4754 else
4755 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
4756 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX)), serie);
4757 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY)), serie);
4758 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
4759 int samples = 1;
4760 if (b.isRGB)
4761 samples = 3;
4762 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
4763 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
4764 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
4765 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
4766 else
4767 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
4768 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
4769 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
4770 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
4771 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
4772 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
4773 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
4774 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
4775 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
4776 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
4777 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
4778 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
4779 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
4780 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
4781
4782 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
4783 {
4784 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
4785 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
4786 {
4787 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
4788 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
4789 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
4790 {
4791 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
4792 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
4793 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
4794 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
4795 }
4796 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
4797 if (c.Color != null)
4798 {
4799 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
4800 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
4801 }
4802 if (c.Emission != 0)
4803 {
4804 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
4805 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
4806 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
4807 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
4808 }
4809 /*
4810 if (c.ContrastMethod != null)
4811 {
4812 ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod cm = (ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod), c.ContrastMethod);
4813 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(cm, serie, channel + r);
4814 }
4815 if (c.IlluminationType != null)
4816 {
4817 ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType il = (ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType), c.IlluminationType.ToUpper());
4818 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(il, serie, channel + r);
4819 }
4820 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
4821 {
4822 ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode am = (ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode), c.AcquisitionMode.ToUpper());
4823 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(am, serie, channel + r);
4824 }
4825 */
4826 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
4827 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
4828 {
4829 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
4830 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
4831 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
4832 }
4833 }
4834 }
4835
4836 int i = 0;
4837 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
4838 {
4839 if (an.roiID == "")
4840 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
4841 else
4842 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
4843 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
4844 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
4845 {
4846 if (an.id != "")
4847 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
4848 else
4849 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
4850 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
4851 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
4852 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
4853 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
4854 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
4855 if (an.Text != "")
4856 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
4857 else
4858 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4859 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4860 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
4861 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
4862 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
4863 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4864 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
4865 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
4866 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
4867 }
4868 else
4869 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
4870 {
4871 if (an.id != "")
4872 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
4873 else
4874 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
4875 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
4876 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
4877 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
4878 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
4879 if (an.Text != "")
4880 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
4881 else
4882 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4883 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4884 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
4885 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
4886 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
4887 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4888 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
4889 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
4890 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
4891 }
4892 else
4893 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
4894 {
4895 if (an.id != "")
4896 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
4897 else
4898 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
4899 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
4900 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
4901 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
4902 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
4903 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
4904 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
4905 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
4906 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4907 if (an.Text != "")
4908 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
4909 else
4910 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4911 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4912 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
4913 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
4914 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
4915 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4916 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
4917 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
4918 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
4919 }
4920 else
4921 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
4922 {
4923 if (an.id != "")
4924 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
4925 else
4926 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
4927 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
4928 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
4929 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
4930 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
4931 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
4932 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
4933 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
4934 if (an.Text != "")
4935 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
4936 else
4937 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4938 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4939 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
4940 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
4941 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
4942 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4943 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
4944 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
4945 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
4946 }
4947 else
4948 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
4949 {
4950
4951 if (an.id != "")
4952 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
4953 else
4954 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
4955 //We need to change Rectangle to ellipse radius;
4956 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
4957 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
4958 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
4959 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
4960
4961 double x = an.Point.X + w;
4962 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
4963 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
4964 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
4965 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
4966 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
4967 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
4968 if (an.Text != "")
4969 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
4970 else
4971 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4972 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4973 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
4974 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
4975 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
4976 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4977 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
4978 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
4979 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
4980 }
4981 else
4982 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
4983 {
4984 if (an.id != "")
4985 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
4986 else
4987 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
4988 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
4989 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
4990 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
4991 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
4992 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
4993 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4994 if (an.Text != "")
4995 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
4996 else
4997 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
4998 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
4999 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5000 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5001 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5002 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5003 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5004 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5005 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5006 }
5007 i++;
5008 }
5009
5010 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
5011 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5012 {
5013 //Correct order of parameters.
5014 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
5015 {
5016 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5017 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
5018 }
5019 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
5020 {
5021 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5022 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
5023 }
5024 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5025 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5026 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5027 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
5028 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
5029 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
5030 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5031 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5032 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5033
5034 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
5035 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
5036 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5037 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5038 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5039
5040 }
5041
5042 }
5043 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
5044 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
5045 writer.setId(f);
5046 status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
5047 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
5048 {
5049 string file = bms[i].file;
5050 BioImage b = bms[i];
5051 writer.setSeries(i);
5052 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5053 {
5054 progressValue = (float)bu / (float)b.Buffers.Count;
5055 byte[] bts = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
5056 writer.saveBytes(bu, bts);
5057 }
5058 }
5059 bool stop = false;
5060 do
5061 {
5062 try
5063 {
5064 writer.close();
5065 stop = true;
5066 }
5067 catch (Exception e)
5068 {
5069 //Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
5070 }
5071
5072 } while (!stop);
5073 }
5074 public static void SaveOMESeries(string[] files, string f, bool planes)
5075 {
5076 BioImage[] bm = new BioImage[files.Length];
5077 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5078 {
5079 bm[i] = Images.GetImage(files[i]);
5080 }
5081 SaveOMESeries(bm,f,planes);
5082 }
5083 private static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
5084 {
5085 switch (format)
5086 {
5087 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
5088 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
5089 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
5090 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
5091 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
5092 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
5093 return 4;
5094 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
5095 return 3;
5096 default:
5097 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
5098 }
5099 }
5100 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
5101 {
5102 if (File.Exists(file))
5103 File.Delete(file);
5104 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
5105 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
5106 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
5107 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5108 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5109 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
5110 {
5111 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Resolution];
5112 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
5113 {
5114 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5115 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5116 {
5117 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5118 }
5119 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5120 {
5121 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5122 }
5123 }
5124 else
5125 {
5126 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
5127 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
5128 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
5129 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5130 {
5131 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5132 }
5133 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5134 {
5135 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5136 }
5137 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5138 }
5139 }
5140 int s = 0;
5141 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
5142 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
5143 int minx = int.MaxValue;
5144 int miny = int.MaxValue;
5145 double last = 0;
5146 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5147 {
5148 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
5149 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
5150 if (minx > xs)
5151 minx = xs;
5152 if (miny > ys)
5153 miny = ys;
5154 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
5155 last = px;
5156 }
5157 s = 0;
5158 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
5159 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
5160 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
5161 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
5162 NetVips.Image img = null;
5163 int ib = 0;
5164
5165 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5166 {
5167 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
5168 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
5169 c = 3;
5170 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
5171 met +=
5172 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
5173 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
5174 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
5175 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
5176 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
5177 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
5178 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
5179 int i = 0;
5180 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
5181 {
5182 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
5183 i++;
5184 }
5185 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
5186 ib++;
5187 }
5188 met += "</OME>";
5189 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5190 {
5191 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
5192 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
5193 int bands = GetBands(pf);
5194 if(bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5195 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5196 else
5197 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5198 int i = 0;
5199 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
5200 {
5201 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
5202 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
5203 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
5204 NetVips.Image tile;
5205 if(b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5206 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5207 else
5208 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5209 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
5210 i++;
5211 };
5212 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
5213 {
5214 // Set the ImageDescription tag
5215 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
5216 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
5217 });
5218 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5219 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
5220 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5221 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5222 else
5223 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
5224 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5225 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5226 s++;
5227 }
5228
5229 }
5230
5239 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, bool tab)
5240 {
5241 if (!OMESupport())
5242 return null;
5243 return OpenOMESeries(file, tab, true)[0];
5244 }
5253 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie)
5254 {
5255 if (!OMESupport())
5256 return null;
5257 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.OpenOME(\"" + file + "\"," + serie + ");");
5258 return OpenOME(file, serie, true, false, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
5259 }
5271 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
5272 {
5273 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5274 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5275 {
5276 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i], false);
5277 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
5278 }
5279 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
5280 Images.AddImage(b, true);
5281 return b;
5282 }
5288 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path, bool tab)
5289 {
5290 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
5291 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5292 int z = 0;
5293 int c = 0;
5294 int t = 0;
5295 BioImage bb = null;
5296 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5297 {
5298 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
5299 if (st.Length > 3)
5300 {
5301 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
5302 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
5303 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
5304 }
5305 bb = OpenFile(files[i], tab);
5306 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
5307 }
5308 if (z == 0)
5309 {
5310 /*TO DO
5311 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
5312 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
5313 return null;
5314 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
5315 */
5316 }
5317 else
5318 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
5319 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
5320 Recorder.AddLine("BioImage.FolderToStack(\"" + path + "\");");
5321 return b;
5322 }
5323 static int progress;
5324 static bool vips = false;
5333 public static void OpenVips(BioImage b, int pagecount)
5334 {
5335 try
5336 {
5337 for (int i = 0; i < pagecount; i++)
5338 {
5339 b.vipPages.Add(NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, i));
5340 }
5341 }
5342 catch (Exception e)
5343 {
5344 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
5345 }
5346
5347 }
5367 public static Bitmap ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
5368 {
5369 try
5370 {
5371 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
5372 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
5373 {
5374 Bitmap bm;
5375 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
5376 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
5377 bm = new Bitmap(b.file,width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), 0, null, b.littleEndian);
5378 else
5379 bm = new Bitmap(b.file, width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), 0, null, b.littleEndian);
5380 return bm;
5381
5382 }
5383 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
5384 {
5385 Bitmap bm;
5386 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
5387 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
5388 bm = new Bitmap(b.file, width, height, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), 0, null, b.littleEndian);
5389 else
5390 bm = new Bitmap(b.file, width, height, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, imageData, new ZCT(), 0, null, b.littleEndian);
5391 return bm;
5392 }
5393 }
5394 catch (Exception ex)
5395 {
5396 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
5397 return null;
5398 }
5399 return null;
5400 }
5427 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
5428 {
5429 if (tileSizeX == 0)
5430 tileSizeX = 1920;
5431 if (tileSizeY == 0)
5432 tileSizeY = 1080;
5433 if (file == null || file == "")
5434 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
5435 progressValue = 0;
5436 progFile = file;
5437 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
5438 b.Loading = true;
5439 if (b.meta == null)
5440 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
5441 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5442 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
5443 if (cf != null)
5444 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
5445 if (cf != f)
5446 {
5447 //status = "Opening OME Image.";
5448 reader.close();
5449 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
5450 reader.setId(f);
5451 }
5452 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
5453 reader.setSeries(serie);
5454 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
5455 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
5456 {
5457 b.ispyramidal = true;
5458 tile = true;
5459 }
5460 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
5461 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
5462 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5463 try
5464 {
5465 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
5466 }
5467 catch (Exception)
5468 {
5469 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
5470 }
5471
5472 b.id = file;
5473 b.file = file;
5474 int SizeX, SizeY;
5475 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
5476 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
5477 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
5478 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
5479 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
5480 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
5481 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
5482 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
5483 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
5484 b.bitsPerPixel = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
5485 b.series = serie;
5486 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
5487
5488 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
5489 int i = 0;
5490 while (true)
5491 {
5492 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, 1);
5493 bool def = false;
5494 try
5495 {
5496 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
5497 {
5498 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
5499 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
5500 def = true;
5501 }
5502 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
5503 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
5504 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
5505 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
5506 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
5507 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
5508 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
5509 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
5510 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
5511 {
5512 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
5513 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
5514 }
5515 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
5516 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
5517 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
5518 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
5519 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
5520 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
5521 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
5522 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
5523 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
5524 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
5525 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
5526 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
5527 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
5528 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
5529
5530 }
5531 catch (Exception e)
5532 {
5533 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
5534 }
5535 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
5536 if (!def)
5537 break;
5538 else
5539 b.Channels.Add(ch);
5540 if (i == 0)
5541 {
5542 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
5543 }
5544 else
5545 if (i == 1)
5546 {
5547 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
5548 }
5549 else
5550 if (i == 2)
5551 {
5552 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
5553 }
5554 i++;
5555 }
5556
5557 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
5558 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
5559 {
5560 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
5561 }
5562
5563 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
5564 if ((PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb) && b.SizeC == 3)
5565 {
5566 b.sizeC = 1;
5567 }
5568 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
5569
5570 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
5571 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
5572 {
5573 reader.setSeries(s);
5574 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
5575 {
5576 Resolution res = new Resolution();
5577 try
5578 {
5579 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
5580 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
5581 PixelFormat px;
5582 try
5583 {
5584 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(s));
5585 }
5586 catch (Exception)
5587 {
5588 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
5589 }
5590 res.PixelFormat = px;
5591 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
5592 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
5593 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s) != null)
5594 {
5595 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s).value().doubleValue();
5596 }
5597 else
5598 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
5599 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s) != null)
5600 {
5601 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s).value().doubleValue();
5602 }
5603 else
5604 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
5605
5606 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(s) != null)
5607 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(s).value().doubleValue();
5608 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(s) != null)
5609 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(s).value().doubleValue();
5610 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s) != null)
5611 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s).value().doubleValue();
5612 else
5613 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
5614 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s) != null)
5615 {
5616 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s).value().doubleValue();
5617 }
5618 else
5619 {
5620 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
5621 }
5622 }
5623 catch (Exception e)
5624 {
5625 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
5626 }
5627 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
5628 }
5629 }
5630 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
5631 try
5632 {
5633 string st = OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
5634 if (st != null)
5635 b.slideImage = OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
5636 }
5637 catch (Exception e)
5638 {
5639 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
5640 }
5641 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
5642 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
5643 {
5644 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
5645 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
5646 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
5647 int scount = 1;
5648 try
5649 {
5650 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
5651 }
5652 catch (Exception e)
5653 {
5654 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
5655 }
5656 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
5657 {
5658 string type = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
5659 ROI an = new ROI();
5660 an.roiID = roiID;
5661 an.roiName = roiName;
5662 an.shapeIndex = sc;
5663 if (type == "Point")
5664 {
5665 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
5666 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
5667 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
5668 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
5669 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
5670 an.coord = new ZCT();
5671 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
5672 if (nz != null)
5673 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5674 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
5675 if (nc != null)
5676 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5677 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
5678 if (nt != null)
5679 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5680 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
5681 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
5682 if (fl != null)
5683 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5684 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
5685 if (ff != null)
5686 an.family = ff.name();
5687 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
5688 if (col != null)
5689 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5690 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5691 if (fw != null)
5692 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5693 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
5694 if (colf != null)
5695 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5696 continue;
5697 }
5698 else
5699 if (type == "Line")
5700 {
5701 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
5702 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
5703 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
5704 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
5705 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
5706 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
5707 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
5708 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
5709 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
5710 if (nz != null)
5711 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5712 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
5713 if (nc != null)
5714 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5715 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
5716 if (nt != null)
5717 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5718 an.coord = co;
5719 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
5720 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
5721 if (fl != null)
5722 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5723 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLineFontFamily(im, sc);
5724 if (ff != null)
5725 an.family = ff.name();
5726 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
5727 if (col != null)
5728 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5729 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5730 if (fw != null)
5731 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5732 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
5733 if (colf != null)
5734 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5735 continue;
5736 }
5737 else
5738 if (type == "Rectangle")
5739 {
5740 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
5741 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
5742 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
5743 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
5744 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
5745 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
5746 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
5747 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
5748 if (nz != null)
5749 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5750 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
5751 if (nc != null)
5752 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5753 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
5754 if (nt != null)
5755 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5756 an.coord = co;
5757
5758 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
5759 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
5760 if (fl != null)
5761 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5762 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getRectangleFontFamily(im, sc);
5763 if (ff != null)
5764 an.family = ff.name();
5765 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
5766 if (col != null)
5767 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5768 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5769 if (fw != null)
5770 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5771 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
5772 if (colf != null)
5773 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5774 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
