5775 continue;
5776 }
5777 else
5778 if (type == "Ellipse")
5779 {
5780 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
5781 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
5782 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
5783 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
5784 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
5785 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
5786 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
5787 double w = ew * 2;
5788 double h = eh * 2;
5789 double x = px - ew;
5790 double y = py - eh;
5791 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
5792 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
5793 if (nz != null)
5794 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5795 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
5796 if (nc != null)
5797 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5798 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
5799 if (nt != null)
5800 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5801 an.coord = co;
5802 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
5803 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
5804 if (fl != null)
5805 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5806 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getEllipseFontFamily(im, sc);
5807 if (ff != null)
5808 an.family = ff.name();
5809 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
5810 if (col != null)
5811 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5812 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5813 if (fw != null)
5814 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5815 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
5816 if (colf != null)
5817 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5818 }
5819 else
5820 if (type == "Polygon")
5821 {
5822 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
5823 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
5824 an.closed = true;
5825 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
5826 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
5827 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
5828 if (pts.Length > 100)
5829 {
5830 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
5831 }
5832 an.AddPoints(pts);
5833 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
5834 if (nz != null)
5835 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5836 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
5837 if (nc != null)
5838 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5839 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
5840 if (nt != null)
5841 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5842 an.coord = co;
5843 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
5844 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
5845 if (fl != null)
5846 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5847 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolygonFontFamily(im, sc);
5848 if (ff != null)
5849 an.family = ff.name();
5850 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
5851 if (col != null)
5852 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5853 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5854 if (fw != null)
5855 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5856 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
5857 if (colf != null)
5858 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5859 }
5860 else
5861 if (type == "Polyline")
5862 {
5863 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
5864 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
5865 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
5866 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
5867 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
5868 {
5869 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
5870 }
5871 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
5872 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
5873 if (nz != null)
5874 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5875 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
5876 if (nc != null)
5877 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5878 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
5879 if (nt != null)
5880 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5881 an.coord = co;
5882 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
5883 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
5884 if (fl != null)
5885 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5886 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolylineFontFamily(im, sc);
5887 if (ff != null)
5888 an.family = ff.name();
5889 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
5890 if (col != null)
5891 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5892 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5893 if (fw != null)
5894 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5895 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
5896 if (colf != null)
5897 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5898 }
5899 else
5900 if (type == "Label")
5901 {
5902 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
5903 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
5904
5905 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
5906 if (nz != null)
5907 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
5908 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
5909 if (nc != null)
5910 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
5911 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
5912 if (nt != null)
5913 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
5914 an.coord = co;
5915
5916 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
5917 if (fl != null)
5918 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
5919 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLabelFontFamily(im, sc);
5920 if (ff != null)
5921 an.family = ff.name();
5922 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
5923 if (col != null)
5924 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
5925 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
5926 if (fw != null)
5927 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
5928 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
5929 if (colf != null)
5930 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
5931 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
5932 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
5933 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
5934 }
5935 if (b.Volume.Intersects(new PointD(an.BoundingBox.X, an.BoundingBox.Y)))
5936 b.Annotations.Add(an);
5937 }
5938 }
5939
5940 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
5941 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
5942
5943 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
5944 // read the image data bytes
5945 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
5946 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
5947 int z = 0;
5948 int c = 0;
5949 int t = 0;
5950 //status = "Reading OME Image Planes";
5951 if (!tile)
5952 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
5953 {
5954 Bitmap bf;
5955 progressValue = (float)p / (float)pages;
5956 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
5957 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
5958 if (bf.isRGB && !inter && b.littleEndian)
5959 bf.SwitchRedBlue();
5960 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
5961 }
5962 else
5963 {
5964 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
5965 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
5966 }
5967 int pls;
5968 try
5969 {
5970 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
5971 }
5972 catch (Exception)
5973 {
5974 pls = 0;
5975 }
5976 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
5977 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
5978 {
5979 Plane pl = new Plane();
5980 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
5981 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
5982 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
5983 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
5984 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
5985 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
5986 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
5987 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
5988 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
5989 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
5990 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
5991 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
5992 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
5993 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
5994 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
5995 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
5996 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
5997 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
5998 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
5999 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
6000 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6001 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
6002 }
6003
6004 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, order);
6005 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
6006 do
6007 {
6008 Thread.Sleep(50);
6009 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6010 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6011 AutoThreshold(b, true);
6012 b.SetLabelMacroResolutions();
6013 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6014 b.StackThreshold(true);
6015 else
6016 b.StackThreshold(false);
6017 if (addToImages)
6018 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6019 //We use a try block to close the reader as sometimes this will cause an error.
6020 bool stop = false;
6021 do
6022 {
6023 try
6024 {
6025 reader.close();
6026 stop = true;
6027 }
6028 catch (Exception)
6029 {
6030
6031 }
6032 } while (!stop);
6033 b.Loading = false;
6034 return b;
6035 }
6036 public ImageReader imRead;
6037 public Tiff tifRead;
6038 static Bitmap bm;
6051 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
6052 {
6053 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
6054 {
6055 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
6056 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
6057 }
6058 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
6059 if (b.slideImage != null)
6060 {
6061 return new Bitmap(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.slideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), coord, "");
6062 }
6063
6064 string curfile = reader.getCurrentFile();
6065 if (curfile == null)
6066 {
6067 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6068 reader.close();
6069 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6070 Console.WriteLine(b.file);
6071 reader.setId(b.file);
6072 }
6073 else
6074 {
6075 string fi = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6076 string cf = curfile.Replace("\\", "/");
6077 if (cf != fi)
6078 {
6079 reader.close();
6080 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6081 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6082 reader.setId(b.file);
6083 }
6084 }
6085 if (reader.getSeries() != serie)
6086 reader.setSeries(serie);
6087 int SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6088 int SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6089 bool flat = reader.hasFlattenedResolutions();
6090 int p = b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
6091 bool littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
6092 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
6093 if (tilex < 0)
6094 tilex = 0;
6095 if (tiley < 0)
6096 tiley = 0;
6097 if (tilex >= SizeX)
6098 tilex = SizeX;
6099 if (tiley >= SizeY)
6100 tiley = SizeY;
6101 int sx = tileSizeX;
6102 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
6103 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
6104 int sy = tileSizeY;
6105 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
6106 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
6107 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
6108 if (sx <= 1)
6109 return null;
6110 if (sy <= 1)
6111 return null;
6112 try
6113 {
6114 byte[] bytesr = reader.openBytes(b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
6115 bool interleaved = reader.isInterleaved();
6116 if (bm != null)
6117 bm.Dispose();
6118 bm = new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
6119 if (bm.isRGB && !interleaved && littleEndian)
6120 bm.SwitchRedBlue();
6121 return bm;
6122 }
6123 catch (Exception e)
6124 {
6125 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6126 return null;
6127 }
6128 }
6133 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
6134 {
6135 if (bit16)
6136 {
6137 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
6138 {
6139 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
6140 {
6141 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
6142 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
6143 }
6144 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6145 }
6146 bitsPerPixel = 16;
6147 }
6148 else
6149 {
6150 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
6151 {
6152 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
6153 {
6154 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
6155 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
6156 }
6157 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6158 }
6159 bitsPerPixel = 8;
6160 }
6161 }
6172 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
6173 {
6174 if (bt <= 255)
6175 return 8;
6176 if (bt <= 512)
6177 return 9;
6178 else if (bt <= 1023)
6179 return 10;
6180 else if (bt <= 2047)
6181 return 11;
6182 else if (bt <= 4095)
6183 return 12;
6184 else if (bt <= 8191)
6185 return 13;
6186 else if (bt <= 16383)
6187 return 14;
6188 else if (bt <= 32767)
6189 return 15;
6190 else
6191 return 16;
6192 }
6198 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
6199 {
6200 if (bt == 8)
6201 return 255;
6202 if (bt == 9)
6203 return 512;
6204 else if (bt == 10)
6205 return 1023;
6206 else if (bt == 11)
6207 return 2047;
6208 else if (bt == 12)
6209 return 4095;
6210 else if (bt == 13)
6211 return 8191;
6212 else if (bt == 14)
6213 return 16383;
6214 else if (bt == 15)
6215 return 32767;
6216 else
6217 return 65535;
6218 }
6228 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
6229 {
6230 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
6231 {
6232 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
6233 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
6234 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
6235 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
6236 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
6237 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
6238 }
6239 else
6240 {
6241 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
6242 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
6243 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
6244 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
6245 }
6246 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
6247 }
6258 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
6259 {
6260 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
6261 {
6262 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
6263 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
6264 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
6265 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
6266 }
6267 else
6268 {
6269 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
6270 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
6271 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
6272 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
6273 }
6274 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
6275 }
6283 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool tab, bool addToImages)
6284 {
6285 //We wait incase OME has not initialized yet.
6286 if (!initialized)
6287 do
6288 {
6289 Thread.Sleep(100);
6290 //Application.DoEvents();
6291 } while (!Initialized);
6292 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6293 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
6294 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6295 try
6296 {
6297 if (reader.getCurrentFile() != file)
6298 {
6299 status = "Opening OME Image.";
6300 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6301 reader.setId(file);
6302 }
6303 }
6304 catch (Exception e)
6305 {
6306 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
6307 return null;
6308 }
6309
6310 bool tile = false;
6311 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
6312 tile = true;
6313 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
6314 BioImage[] bs = null;
6315 if (tile)
6316 {
6317 bs = new BioImage[1];
6318 bs[0] = OpenOME(file, 0, tab, addToImages, true, 0, 0, 1920, 1080);
6319 bs[0].isPyramidal = true;
6320 Images.AddImage(bs[0], tab);
6321 return bs;
6322 }
6323 else
6324 bs = new BioImage[count];
6325 reader.close();
6326 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
6327 {
6328 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
6329 if (bs[i] == null)
6330 return null;
6331 }
6332 return bs;
6333 }
6337 public static async Task OpenAsync(string file, bool OME, bool newtab, bool images)
6338 {
6339 openfile = file;
6340 omes = OME;
6341 tab = newtab;
6342 add = images;
6343 await Task.Run(OpenThread);
6344 }
6348 public static async Task OpenAsync(string[] files, bool OME, bool tab, bool images)
6349 {
6350 foreach (string file in files)
6351 {
6352 await OpenAsync(file, OME, tab, images);
6353 }
6354 }
6355 static string openfile;
6356 static bool omes, tab, add;
6357 static int serie;
6358 static void OpenThread()
6359 {
6360 OpenFile(openfile, serie, tab, add);
6361 }
6362 static string savefile, saveid;
6363 static bool some;
6364 static int sserie;
6365 static void SaveThread()
6366 {
6367 if (omes)
6368 SaveOME(savefile, saveid);
6369 else
6370 SaveFile(savefile, saveid);
6371 }
6384 public static async Task SaveAsync(string file, string id, int serie, bool ome)
6385 {
6386 savefile = file;
6387 saveid = id;
6388 some = ome;
6389 await Task.Run(SaveThread);
6390 }
6391
6392 static List<string> sts = new List<string>();
6393 static void SaveSeriesThread()
6394 {
6395 if (omes)
6396 {
6397 BioImage[] bms = new BioImage[sts.Count];
6398 int i = 0;
6399 foreach (string st in sts)
6400 {
6401 bms[i] = Images.GetImage(st);
6402 }
6403 SaveOMESeries(bms, savefile, Planes);
6404 }
6405 else
6406 SaveSeries(sts.ToArray(), savefile);
6407 }
6417 public static async Task SaveSeriesAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, bool ome)
6418 {
6419 sts.Clear();
6420 foreach (BioImage item in imgs)
6421 {
6422 sts.Add(item.ID);
6423 }
6424 savefile = file;
6425 some = ome;
6426 await Task.Run(SaveSeriesThread);
6427 }
6428 static Enums.ForeignTiffCompression comp;
6429 static int compLev = 0;
6430 static BioImage[] bms;
6431 static void SavePyramidalThread()
6432 {
6433 SaveOMEPyramidal(bms, savefile, comp, compLev);
6434 }
6448 public static async Task SavePyramidalAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com, int compLevel)
6449 {
6450 bms = imgs;
6451 savefile = file;
6452 comp = com;
6453 compLev = compLevel;
6454 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
6455 }
6456 private static List<string> openOMEfile = new List<string>();
6458 private static void OpenOME()
6459 {
6460 foreach (string f in openOMEfile)
6461 {
6462 OpenOME(f, true);
6463 }
6464 openOMEfile.Clear();
6465 }
6466 private static string saveOMEfile;
6467 private static string saveOMEID;
6471 public static void Open(string file)
6472 {
6473 OpenFile(file);
6474 }
6478 public static void Open(string[] files)
6479 {
6480 foreach (string file in files)
6481 {
6482 Open(file);
6483 }
6484 }
6490 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files, bool tab)
6491 {
6492 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
6493 int z = 0;
6494 int c = 0;
6495 int t = 0;
6496 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6497 {
6498 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
6499 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
6500 string[] st = str.Split('_');
6501 if (st.Length > 3)
6502 {
6503 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
6504 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
6505 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
6506 }
6507 if (i == 0)
6508 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i], tab);
6509 else
6510 {
6511 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, tab, false);
6512 }
6513 }
6514 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
6515 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6516 {
6517 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
6518 {
6519 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
6520 }
6521 }
6522 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
6523 b.Volume = new VolumeD(bs[0].Volume.Location, new Point3D(bs[0].SizeX * bs[0].PhysicalSizeX, bs[0].SizeY * bs[0].PhysicalSizeY, (z + 1) * bs[0].PhysicalSizeZ));
6524 return b;
6525 }
6529 public static void Update(BioImage b)
6530 {
6531 b = OpenFile(b.file);
6532 }
6534 public void Update()
6535 {
6536 Update(this);
6537 }
6542 public static void Save(string file, string ID)
6543 {
6544 SaveFile(file, ID);
6545 }
6547 private static void SaveOME()
6548 {
6549 SaveOME(saveOMEfile, saveOMEID);
6550 }
6551 public static bool OmeSupport = false;
6552 static bool supportDialog = false;
6559 public static bool OMESupport()
6560 {
6561 bool isMacOS = RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform.OSX);
6562 if (RuntimeInformation.OSArchitecture == Architecture.Arm64 && isMacOS)
6563 {
6564 if (!supportDialog)
6565 {
6566 MessageDialog md = new MessageDialog(
6567 null,
6568 DialogFlags.DestroyWithParent,
6569 MessageType.Info,
6570 ButtonsType.Ok, "BioGTK currently doens't support OME images on Arm64 MacOS due to dependency IKVM 8.6.2 not yet supporting Mac Arm64." +
6571 "On MacOS ImageJ Tiff files, LibVips supported whole-slide images, and BioGTK Tiff files are supported.");
6572 md.Run();
6573 }
6574 supportDialog = true;
6575 return false;
6576 }
6577 else
6578 {
6579 OmeSupport = true;
6580 return true;
6581 }
6582 }
6583 static NetVips.Image netim;
6592 public static bool VipsSupport(string file)
6593 {
6594 try
6595 {
6596 netim = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
6597 }
6598 catch (Exception e)
6599 {
6600 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
6601 return false;
6602 }
6603 netim.Close();
6604 netim.Dispose();
6605 return true;
6606 }
6607 private static Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
6608 private static ServiceFactory factory;
6609 private static OMEXMLService service;
6610 private static ImageReader reader;
6611 private static ImageWriter writer;
6612 private loci.formats.meta.IMetadata meta;
6613
6614 //We use UNIX type line endings since they are supported by ImageJ & Bio.
6615 public const char NewLine = '\n';
6616 public const string columns = "ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,S,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE\n";
6617
6623 public static string OpenXML(string file)
6624 {
6625 if (!file.EndsWith(".tif"))
6626 return null;
6627 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
6628 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
6629 return f[0].ToString();
6630 }
6631
6638 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
6639 {
6640 if (!OMESupport())
6641 return null;
6642 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
6643 // create OME-XML metadata store
6644 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
6645 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
6646 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
6647 // create format reader
6648 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
6649 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
6650 // initialize file
6651 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6652 imageReader.setId(file);
6653 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
6654 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
6655 double physicalSizeX = 0;
6656 double physicalSizeY = 0;
6657 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
6658 double stageSizeX = 0;
6659 double stageSizeY = 0;
6660 double stageSizeZ = 0;
6661 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
6662 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
6663 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
6664 try
6665 {
6666 bool hasPhysical = false;
6667 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
6668 {
6669 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
6670 hasPhysical = true;
6671 }
6672 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
6673 {
6674 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
6675 }
6676 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
6677 {
6678 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
6679 }
6680 else
6681 {
6682 physicalSizeZ = 1;
6683 }
6684 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
6685 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
6686 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
6687 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
6688 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
6689 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
6690 else
6691 stageSizeZ = 1;
6692 }
6693 catch (Exception e)
6694 {
6695 stageSizeX = 0;
6696 stageSizeY = 0;
6697 stageSizeZ = 1;
6698 }
6699 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
6700 int rc = meta.getROICount();
6701 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
6702 {
6703 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
6704 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
6705 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6706 int scount = 1;
6707 try
6708 {
6709 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
6710 }
6711 catch (Exception e)
6712 {
6713 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6714 }
6715 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
6716 {
6717 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
6718 ROI an = new ROI();
6719 an.roiID = roiID;
6720 an.roiName = roiName;
6721 an.shapeIndex = sc;
6722 if (type == "Point")
6723 {
6724 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
6725 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
6726 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6727 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6728 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6729 an.coord = new ZCT();
6730 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
6731 if (nz != null)
6732 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6733 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
6734 if (nc != null)
6735 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6736 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
6737 if (nt != null)
6738 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6739 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
6740 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
6741 if (fl != null)
6742 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6743 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6744 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6745 if (col != null)
6746 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6747 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6748 if (fw != null)
6749 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6750 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6751 if (colf != null)
6752 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6753 }
6754 else
6755 if (type == "Line")
6756 {
6757 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
6758 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
6759 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6760 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6761 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6762 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6763 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6764 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6765 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
6766 if (nz != null)
6767 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6768 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
6769 if (nc != null)
6770 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6771 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
6772 if (nt != null)
6773 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6774 an.coord = co;
6775 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
6776 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
6777 if (fl != null)
6778 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6779 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6780 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6781 if (col != null)
6782 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6783 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6784 if (fw != null)
6785 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6786 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
6787 if (colf != null)
6788 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6789 }
6790 else
6791 if (type == "Rectangle")
6792 {
6793 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
6794 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
6795 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6796 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6797 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
6798 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
6799 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
6800 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
6801 if (nz != null)
6802 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6803 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
6804 if (nc != null)
6805 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6806 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
6807 if (nt != null)
6808 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6809 an.coord = co;
6810
6811 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
6812 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
6813 if (fl != null)
6814 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6815 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6816 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
6817 if (col != null)
6818 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6819 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6820 if (fw != null)
6821 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6822 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
6823 if (colf != null)
6824 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6825 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
6826 }
6827 else
6828 if (type == "Ellipse")
6829 {
6830 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
6831 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
6832 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6833 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6834 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6835 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6836 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
6837 double w = ew * 2;
6838 double h = eh * 2;
6839 double x = px - ew;
6840 double y = py - eh;
6841 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
6842 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
6843 if (nz != null)
6844 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6845 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
6846 if (nc != null)
6847 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6848 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
6849 if (nt != null)
6850 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6851 an.coord = co;
6852 an.Text = meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
6853 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
6854 if (fl != null)
6855 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6856 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6857 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
6858 if (col != null)
6859 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6860 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6861 if (fw != null)
6862 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6863 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
6864 if (colf != null)
6865 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6866 }
6867 else
6868 if (type == "Polygon")
6869 {
6870 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
6871 an.id = meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
6872 an.closed = true;
6873 string pxs = meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
6874 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6875 pts = ToStageSpace(pts, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
6876 if (pts.Length > 100)
6877 {
6878 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
6879 }
6880 an.AddPoints(pts);
6881 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
6882 if (nz != null)
6883 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6884 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
6885 if (nc != null)
6886 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6887 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
6888 if (nt != null)
6889 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6890 an.coord = co;
6891 an.Text = meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
6892 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
6893 if (fl != null)
6894 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6895 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6896 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
6897 if (col != null)
6898 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6899 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6900 if (fw != null)
6901 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6902 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
6903 if (colf != null)
6904 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6905 }
6906 else
6907 if (type == "Polyline")
6908 {
6909 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
6910 an.id = meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
6911 string pxs = meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
6912 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6913 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
6914 {
6915 pts[pi] = ToStageSpace(pts[pi], physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
6916 }
6917 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
6918 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
6919 if (nz != null)
6920 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6921 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
6922 if (nc != null)
6923 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6924 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
6925 if (nt != null)
6926 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6927 an.coord = co;
6928 an.Text = meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
6929 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
6930 if (fl != null)
6931 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6932 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6933 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6934 if (col != null)
6935 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6936 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6937 if (fw != null)
6938 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6939 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
6940 if (colf != null)
6941 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6942 }
6943 else
6944 if (type == "Label")
6945 {
6946 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
6947 an.id = meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
6948
6949 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
6950 if (nz != null)
6951 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6952 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
6953 if (nc != null)
6954 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6955 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
6956 if (nt != null)
6957 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6958 an.coord = co;
6959
6960 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
6961 if (fl != null)
6962 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6963 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6964 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
6965 if (col != null)
6966 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6967 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6968 if (fw != null)
6969 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6970 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
6971 if (colf != null)
6972 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6973 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
6974 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6975 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
6976 }
6977 }
6978 }
6979
6980 imageReader.close();
6981 return Annotations;
6982 }
6988 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)
6989 {
6990 string s = "";
6991 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
6992 {
6993 s += ROIToString(Annotations[i]);
6994 }
6995 return s;
6996 }
7003 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
7004 {
7005 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
7006 string pts = "";
7007 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
7008 {
7009 if (j == points.Length - 1)
7010 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7011 else
7012 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
7013 }
7014 char sep = (char)34;
7015 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
7016 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
7017
7018 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
7019 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' +
7020 an.W.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.H.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.fontSize.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + NewLine;
7021 return line;
7022 }
7028 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
7029 {
7030 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
7031 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
7032 return null;
7033 ROI an = new ROI();
7034 string val = "";
7035 bool inSep = false;
7036 int col = 0;
7037 double x = 0;
7038 double y = 0;
7039 double w = 0;
7040 double h = 0;
7041 string line = sts;
7042 bool points = false;
7043 char sep = '"';
7044 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
7045 {
7046 char c = line[i];
7047 if (c == sep)
7048 {
7049 if (!inSep)
7050 {
7051 inSep = true;
7052 }
7053 else
7054 inSep = false;
7055 continue;
7056 }
7057
7058 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
7059 {
7060 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
7061 if (col == 0)
7062 {
7063 //ROIID
7064 an.roiID = val;
7065 }
7066 else
7067 if (col == 1)
7068 {
7069 //ROINAME
7070 an.roiName = val;
7071 }
7072 else
7073 if (col == 2)
7074 {
7075 //TYPE
7076 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
7077 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
7078 an.closed = true;
7079 }
7080 else
7081 if (col == 3)
7082 {
7083 //ID
7084 an.id = val;
7085 }
7086 else
7087 if (col == 4)
7088 {
7089 //SHAPEINDEX/
7090 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
7091 }
7092 else
7093 if (col == 5)
7094 {
7095 //TEXT/
7096 an.Text = val;
7097 }
7098 else
7099 if (col == 6)
7100 {
7101 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
7102 }
7103 else
7104 if (col == 7)
7105 {
7106 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
7107 }
7108 else
7109 if (col == 8)
7110 {
7111 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
7112 }
7113 else
7114 if (col == 9)
7115 {
7116 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
7117 }
7118 else
7119 if (col == 10)
7120 {
7121 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7122 }
7123 else
7124 if (col == 11)
7125 {
7126 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7127 }
7128 else
7129 if (col == 12)
7130 {
7131 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7132 }
7133 else
7134 if (col == 13)
7135 {
7136 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7137 }
7138 else
7139 if (col == 14)
7140 {
7141 //POINTS
7142 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
7143 points = false;
7144 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
7145 }
7146 else
7147 if (col == 15)
7148 {
7149 //STROKECOLOR
7150 string[] st = val.Split(',');
7151 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
7152 }
7153 else
7154 if (col == 16)
7155 {
7156 //STROKECOLORW
7157 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7158 }
7159 else
7160 if (col == 17)
7161 {
7162 //FILLCOLOR
7163 string[] st = val.Split(',');
7164 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
7165 }
7166 else
7167 if (col == 18)
7168 {
7169 //FONTSIZE
7170 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7171 an.fontSize = (float)s;
7172 an.family = "Times New Roman";
7173 }
7174 col++;
7175 val = "";
7176 }
7177 else
7178 val += c;
7179 }
7180
7181 return an;
7182 }
7187 public static void ExportROIsCSV(string filename, List<ROI> Annotations)
7188 {
7189 string con = columns;
7190 con += ROIsToString(Annotations);
7191 File.WriteAllText(filename, con);
7192 }
7198 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
7199 {
7200 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
7201 if (!File.Exists(filename))
7202 return list;
7203 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
7204 //We start reading from line 1.
7205 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
7206 {
7207 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
7208 }
7209 return list;
7210 }
7218 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)
7219 {
7220 if (!OMESupport())
7221 return;
7222 string[] fs = Directory.GetFiles(path);
7223 int i = 0;
7224 foreach (string f in fs)
7225 {
7226 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
7227 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
7228 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
7229 i++;
7230 }
7231 }
7232
7233 private static BioImage bstats = null;
7234 private static bool update = false;
7260 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
7261 {
7262 bstats = b;
7263 Statistics statistics = null;
7264 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7265 statistics = new Statistics(true);
7266 else
7267 statistics = new Statistics(false);
7268 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
7269 {
7270 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
7271 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
7272 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7273 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
7274 else
7275 {
7276 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
7277 {
7278 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
7279 }
7280 }
7281 }
7282 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
7283 {
7284 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
7285 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
7286 {
7287 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7288 {
7289 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
7290 }
7291 else
7292 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
7293 }
7294 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
7295 {
7296 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
7297 {
7298 int ind;
7299 if (b.Channels.Count > b.SizeC)
7300 {
7301 ind = b.Coords[z, 0, t];
7302 }
7303 else
7304 ind = b.Coords[z, c, t];
7305 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7306 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
7307 else
7308 {
7309 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
7310 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
7311 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
7312 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
7313 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
7314 }
7315 }
7316 }
7317 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
7318 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
7319 else
7320 {
7321 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
7322 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
7323 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
7324 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
7325 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
7326 }
7327 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
7328 }
7329 statistics.MeanHistogram();
7330 b.statistics = statistics;
7331
7332 }
7334 public static void AutoThreshold()
7335 {
7336 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
7337 }
7341 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
7342 {
7343 bstats = b;
7344 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
7345 th.Start();
7346 }
7358 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
7359 {
7360 long mf = 0;
7361 int fr = 0;
7362 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
7363 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7364 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
7365 {
7366 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.Coords[i, Channel, Time]]);
7367 dt.Add(f);
7368 if (f > mf)
7369 {
7370 mf = f;
7371 fr = im.Coords[i, Channel, Time];
7372 }
7373 }
7374 //Plot pl = Plot.Create(dt.ToArray(), "Focus");
7375 //pl.Show();
7376 return fr;
7377 }
7385 public static long CalculateFocusQuality(Bitmap b)
7386 {
7387 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7388 {
7389 long sum = 0;
7390 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
7391 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
7392 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
7393 {
7394 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
7395 sum += pixel.R;
7396 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
7397 }
7398 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
7399 }
7400 else
7401 {
7402 long sum = 0;
7403 long sumOfSquares = 0;
7404 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
7405 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
7406 {
7407 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
7408 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
7409 sum += p;
7410 sumOfSquares += p * p;
7411 }
7412 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
7413 }
7414 }
7417 public void Dispose()
7418 {
7419 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
7420 {
7421 Buffers[i].Dispose();
7422 }
7423 for (int i = 0; i < Channels.Count; i++)
7424 {
7425 Channels[i].Dispose();
7426 }
7427 }
7432 public override string ToString()
7433 {
7434 return Filename.ToString() + ", (" + Volume.Location.X + ", " + Volume.Location.Y + ", " + Volume.Location.Z + ")";
7435 }
7436
7443 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, float b)
7444 {
7445 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7446 {
7447 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
7448 }
7449 return a;
7450 }
7451
7458 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, float b)
7459 {
7460 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7461 {
7462 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
7463 }
7464 return a;
7465 }
7472 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, float b)
7473 {
7474 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7475 {
7476 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
7477 }
7478 return a;
7479 }
7480
7487 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, ColorS b)
7488 {
7489 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7490 {
7491 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
7492 }
7493 return a;
7494 }
7501 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, ColorS b)
7502 {
7503 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7504 {
7505 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
7506 }
7507 return a;
7508 }
7516 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, ColorS b)
7517 {
7518 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7519 {
7520 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
7521 }
7522 return a;
7523 }
7530 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, ColorS b)
7531 {
7532 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
7533 {
7534 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
7535 }
7536 return a;
7537 }
7538 }
